title: Great hotel for overnight stay prior to flying
review: We were very happy with this hotel.  It’s 5 minute drive from Alicante airport.  It is a  very modern hotel, the room was spacious and clean.  Spotless bed linen and nice toiletries.   We visited the Spa,  which doesn’t open until 5pm but it has a nice pool with jacuzzi jets.  Plus a steam room and (sauna which was unfortunately out of order).  However, the steam room was excellent.  Spa towels are collected from reception together with wi fi password.  It would have been nice if we had been offered both these at check in - we weren’t.   Breakfast was nicely presented with a good selection of food plus a good coffee machine.   I would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: More than a place to sleep.
review: Dear Remy. Thank you very much for your detailed description of your stay at our Hotel. We are very happy that the facilities and attention received have been to your liking and so well valued. We hope to welcome you very soon, we will be happy to assist you. Sincerely, Hotel Areca & Restaurante Carabí.

title: Excellent location for early or late flights from Alicante airport
review: We had to find a hotell to sleep waiting for an early airoplane. This functioned very well with the hotel’s matebus early in the morning. In addition to this the hotel had a very good kitchen and served an excellent dinner. Peter the norwegian

title: Good Hotel Close to the Airport
review: Dear Peter. Thank you very much for such nice words. It has been a pleasure to have you stayed at our hotel. We hope to see you very soon. Sincerely, Hotel Areca & Restaurante Carabí

title: Disappointed
review: Easy to find with cheerful and helpful staff and literally 5 minutes by car from the airport.  The hotel does have a shuttle.  This is not a luxury hotel but our room was clean and comfortable and the hotel has a resteraunt and pleasant outside bar area.   The spa was excellent , just what you want before or after travelling.   Besides the hotel there are several places to eat a short stroll away.  We ate at the resteraunt SAN Rafael in the Hotel Dona Isabel and the food was very good. We will certainly stay here again.

title: Great hotel for an early flight
review: stayed here one night before an early flight. just 5 minutes from Alicante airport. very easy to find, lots of on road parking. room was spotless. we ate out in a cafe in the town. left before breakfast. would stay here again

title: Perfect Airport Location
review: Stayed here before an early morning flight. Check in was fast and efficient and reception staff very friendly. Room was clean and tidy. There is no door into bathroom so make sure you know your other room mate well before showering.There is a glass door between bathroom and toilet. Bed was comfy and air con very good. Hotel is very modern and spotless. We ate in hotel restaurant and the food was superb, well worth trying if staying here. The hotel is a 5 min taxi ride from airport and a 10min walk away you will find Torrellano train station that will take you into Alicante for 2 euros each way. Would recommend staying here if you have an early morning flight or a late arrival.

title: Very impressed
review: Dear john. Thank you very much for your detailed comment about our hotel. We are very happy for your recommendation and for everything you liked to appreciate our attention and facilities. We hope to see you again on a next visit to our country. We will be happy to assist you. Regards, Hotel Areca& Restaurante Carabí.

title: This hotel was a great find!
review: What a lovely surprise i was expecting a sort of travel lodge style hotel but it was far from that. The hotel is excellent very modern and clean, theres a nice spa with pool and steam room. The staff are excellent and the restaurant food is to an unbelievable high standard.  Really on very level i was impressed i cant say how much would recommend a stay here no problems

title: DonTin
review: After a flight landing at 22.30 this hotel was minutes from airport and 24hour check in. Room was clean and comfortable. Bar was still open to get a drink, but the water in the mini bar had been opened! I did mention this to reception on check out. Great location and minutes away from shops. Breakfast was good , buffet style and only 12 euro. Both mornings I had spa to myself, but sadly no pool outside. There is the garden in the outside terrace restaurant so was at least able to sit out. Food was very good and food and drinks were reasonably priced. Check out was 12 midday and our flight was not until 22.35 but they looked after our luggage and we used facilities until we had to leave for airport. On a walk in the morning you could see the planes landing so great for plane…

title: Never again!
review: We booked this Hotel because of the vicinity to the Airport, free Shuttle and WiFi Service. When we arrived, the WiFi didnt work so they sent us to the City to find WiFi ans Said it will be fixed in the evening. When we came back, it was still not working and they told us that we wont die because of that. I asked If He meant the Statement serious and He apologized, but still, it reflected their Attitude. The Shuttle Service was also not available and if IT hadnt been that late and travelling with a toddler, I would have checked Out immediately since in the Childrens room was a strong smell of cigaretts (even tough they claim to be smoke free).   To be fair, the rooms were clean and lovely. The beds were comfortable. But we would not recommend this Hotel to our Family and Friends.

title: Lets Start with a Person entering your room at 5am after been given the wrong key
review: First of all we would like to thank you for the time spent writing and sending us your opinion about your stay at our Hotel. We are sorry to hear that the room did not meet your expectations. Apologize for not having available the Wi-Fi network during the night of your stay. Surely the reception staff informed you that the problem was foreign to us. The network stopped and when restarting, the system configuration was deleted. We work as quickly as possible to solve it but until the day after his departure it was not possible. Regarding the transfer inform you that this is available every day of the week except 2 days: Monday and Tuesday. Giving causation during your stay. In this sense, the reception staff offered you the option of calling a taxi but you decided not to call it. In any case we regret the inconvenience you may have had in our Hotel and we hope that we have a new opportunity to show you the quality of our services and facilities. Sincerely, Areca Hotel.

title: Overnight stay
review: Feel a bit destroyed really writing this , but it must be said and taken notice at the Highest level of the Hotel Chain, Great hotel Fantastic Staff BUT...... new staff on the desk, which is not a issue untill some one in this case, a male was standing hovering over the bed, in our sons and girlfriends room  ( aged 25 ) room located next door to us at 5am, this could have turned out very nasty and violent, when seeing a intruder in the early hours, genuine mistake or not THIS SHOULD NEVER HAPPEN, how would you handle this, when the phone rings and your sons says theres been a man in our room, immediately we were at reception, apolagies were given but this really must never happen again, we will stop there again, Great Hotel and location

title: Clean and convenient
review: We stayed overnight after a late flight into Alacante. The hotel is a short taxi ride from the airport. The facilities and rooms are very good, decent breakfast and close to railway for onward travel. I would definitely stay again if I needed a hotel after a late flight.

title: Excellent standard
review: Stayed one night on way home from Champions League Final in Madrid 🏆🏆🏆🏆🏆🏆  Clean and convenient and very good value £55. Dinner was about £25 in their decent restaurant.  There is a spa with small pool, sauna and steam room.  Taxi to the airport took 10 mins and cost about £10. Hotel booked it and were really helpful

title: Overnight Stay
review: Lovely hotel close to Alicante airport, and only a short stroll into the town. Very friendly helpful staff, arrived early and not a problem checking me in early, clean large rooms and gorgeous food. Would definitely stay again.

title: Near Alicante airport.
review: I've been there for a one night in order to catch my flight early in the morning. Low priced but great value. Somehow quirky design on the rooms but it was very comfortable. The staff was friendly and very kind.

title: Nice place
review: Nice room,wonderful spa pool sauna as well.But be careful when you shower,it b as tile floors and when wet it becomes very slick.My wife fell but was not Injured I did not tell the h I tel which is something I should have done..

title: Lovely Hotel
review: Lovely 4 star hotel, close to the Airport cab from Airport was 9.60€. The room, 118 was spacious, clean and twin bedded. Had a great nights sleep. Hairdryer, soaps etc provided. My only bugbear was the en-suite had no door and therefore no privacy.  But if you’re ok with that I would gladly recommend it.

title: Stopover in Alicante before a walking holiday
review: The Areca is very close to the Alicante airport-but I did not notice the planes at all.The rooms we had were ideal, modern and clean. We arrived late but had a really nice meal in the restaurant. Breakfast the next morning was excellent -much better than the usual hotel food. We tried the spa which is compact but enjoyable. The staff could not have been better, helpful in every way. We will use this hotel again

title: Work Stay
review: Stayed here for work for 2 nights in January. Arrived at the hotel to find it was very nice with its new furnishings and nice garden areas. The check in process was quick and easy and the staff were very pleasant. I arrived at my room which was lovely, reviews said old and dated but they are better than that, they have a few imperfections but other than that they are fine. The pool area is very nice it’s indoors which is great in January and has a sauna, pool, steam room and jets. The pool is small but if you know how to operate the wave machine you can get a good swim. The breakfast is lovely traditional Spanish with cheese and ham and eggs and bacon. It’s more than fine for anyone. I really enjoyed it and apparently in the summer it’s outdoors which would be lovely...

title: Very clean hotel
review: Stayed here for a night for a little break and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Very friendly and helpful staff. Exceptionally clean throughout and a fantastic little spa.  The bar is also very nice with good staff and decent pricing.  We didn’t eat in the restaurant but wish that it had been warm enough to sit outside as the courtyard terrace looked fabulous.  Would definitely stay here again.

title: Awesome staff and nice hotel
review: This hotel is located in a sleepy town with the odd restaurant dotted in the street.   The hotel is just a few minutes from the airport and charge very reasonable rates.   The rooms are comfortable and well maintained.  The cleaning is perfect.   The only thing that was missing was a kettle or coffee maker in the room - shame that such a small things was the only thing I could point out.  The facilities are excellent.   The biggest benefit of this hotel is the lovely staff.

title: Our first choice!
review: Our first choice ! Whenever using Alicante airport, this is our first choice when in either an early or late flight. Comfortable, friendly and very well located. Food and drink service, from very competent staff, good.

title: Alicante Hotel
review: Last night of the touring holiday, Areca was the closest nice hotel to the airport. Very comfortable with 5€ secure parking, giving a total bill of 65€ for the night ( excluding breakfast which we had at the airport). Only minor gripe, the shuttle bus was not running Saturday, we planned on dropping the car off Friday night, not sure why it wasn’t running.

title: Great hotel, great service, good food and close to the airport
review: This hotel is fairly modern.  The rooms are spacious and clean. We ate in the restaurant and were very pleased with the food (ribs and seared tuna).  Wine in the bar and restaurant were also good.  A welcome when we arrived and everyone spoke English, which is a bonus.  Bar staff and restaurant staff also very efficient. The property is about two to three minutes from the airport.  They also run an airport shuttle for 9€ per room.  Free parking.  There are also good bar snacks available if you don’t want to use the restaurant. Would we stay again....absolutely!

title: Good hotel
review: Dear Jennie. We greatly appreciate your assessment of your recent stay at Hotel Areca. We are happy to know that you enjoyed the room, our location and our restaurant. Thank you very much for mentioning the work of the staff. We hope to have the opportunity to receive you very soon. Sincerely, Hotel Areca.

title: Almost brilliant
review: Good hotel for overnight stay, staff good and friendly l, rooms clean and comfortable. Very near to the airport, great if you have an early morning flight. Was a little disappointed in the food last time, but will try again

title: Great for airport
review: stayed here for the night prior to going to the airport, place was beautiful, staff were excellent apart from one waiter, he tainted our stay which would have been five stars,we asked him if we could have our coffee in the lovely garden he abruptly said no, on walking back to reception the nice girl on duty asked if we were okay, after telling her what happened she sorted out coffee in the garden straight away, the waiter never said a word to us and served us coffee.On the evening we were looking forward to a fantastic meal in the restaurant, we had not made a reservation but their were plenty of unreserved tables available. We asked the waiter if we could eat here he said no in a offish manner and proceeded to ignore us.we then sat in the cafeteria next door and asked if we…

title: Ideal for airport
review: Stayed for one night before our early morning flight.  On arrival very friendly receptionist who spoke fabulous English, quickly checked in and hotel facilities explained, why oh why did I forget my swimsuit as I forgot about the spa facilities! Room spacious, clean and had everything you would require. Decided to eat in the hotel restaurant outside space having their tasting menu which was plentiful and delicious, wine also great and although more expensive than in a local restaurant not stupid price for basically an airport hotel. All in all great food, staff, rooms and overall stay I will be back next time I have an early flight but will have my swimsuit!

title: Perfect Location for the Airport
review: Just 3 km away - this is the perfect place to chill out after a long drive - enjoy a drink in the garden before enjoying a fantastic array of dishes on offer in the hotel restaurant - you will not be disappointed.  The hotel rooms are functional, modern and clean and all essentials have been thought of except for bottled water.  We were going to use the spa facilities, but these aren't air conditioned and extremely hot in high season but overall the facilities for a small budget hotel were surprisingly very good and I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again and recommend the hotel to others.

title: Lovely Hotel
review: Beautiful rooms, very clean and comfortable. The restaurant was excellent too. We stayed for one night after landing at Alicante late in the evening. It was a lovely refreshing break after a long flight.

title: My family staid for one night
review: We had very nice welcoming right after midnight.  The check in was nice and easy and we where all a sleep few minutes later.  This is a very nice hotel close to the airport and a excellent value for the money.

title: Great find!
review: We had a very early flight home so needed an hotel close by for one night and we chose this one based on the reviews...we are glad we did. Check-in was friendly and efficient. Our room was large and comfortable, and the air conditioning worked well (individually controlled).  The bed was two singles pushed together which was just fine...linens and pillows good. The bathroom was large and had a shower over the tub (needed a hand rail to make entrance and exit safer) there was a separate WC, with frosted glass door. There is a lovely little walled garden at the back of the hotel where we sat for drinks and then had a light dinner. The food was nicely presented and very tasty. It is a full service hotel, although we did not use any other services. There was a shuttle to the airport…

title: Excellent value for money, close to airport
review: Arrived in the evening, took 5 min from the airport. Looks dull on the outside but has been nicely refurbished inside, fresh and modern. We had a connecting room and it was nice, clean and just what we needed. Ate dinner in the restaurant which was nice, pretty setting and good value for money! Even managed a morning dip in the pool, kids liked it.

title: Nice hotel close to the airport
review: It was a nice place to spend the night.  We stayed at the hotel for one night before an early morning flight. We had a tasty dinner at the hotel, and we were offered breakfast in the morning at an additional cost.

title: Convenient and comfortable
review: The hotel is well located at the edge of the town and only 5 minutes drive from the airport. It has a car park but there is plenty of free parking in the surrounding streets.  Friendly welcome on arrival and reception staff were very helpful throughout our stay. Rooms were a good size, clean and comfortable.  We checked out at 5am and I couldn’t find anyone on reception then nor any bell to call them.

title: Fairly good place
review: Very convenient if you need to stay close to the airport - just 2 min driving. Very modern rooms, lobby and bar. Parking is paid (5 eur as of June 2018) but you can park on the street, just opposite the hotel for free. Perfect location to spend the night if you arrive on a late flight, and plan to travel further in the upcoming morning (like we did).

title: Five minutes from airport
review: Lovely hotel right on the doorstep of Alicante airport.  Plenty car hire places within a five minute walk. Lots of little restaurants, cake shops around too. The food in the hotel is excellent. The staff here were really helpful & welcoming. Lovely place.

title: Perfect for early flight
review: Dear Terru. Thank you very much for sharing your stay with Hotel Areca with the rest of the tripadvisor users. We are glad that everything was to your liking. We will be happy to see you again at our hotel. Sincerely, Hotel Areca.

title: Perfect for Airport
review: Great staff (specifically Benilde) at the hotel who let us leave our bags prior to our stay.   The room was lovely and very modern and spotlessly  clean, chambermaids were really friendly.  We had 201 next to lift and you could barely hear the lift and I am a light sleeper.  If you are using the pool, ask the times at check in as they have different times for seasons. I used the sun terrace too which was a little tricky to find.  There 4 sunbeds but as there must have been recent rain, could have done with a bit of a clean.  The breakfast is what you would expect but at 12€ a little expensive. It is served in a lovely little oasis garden which is lovely.  Hotel location is perfect for Airport but not for too long as nothing to do in Torrelano although there us a train station…

title: Airport Stopover
review: Dear Sandy. Thank you very much for such a nice comment and fantastic assessment. We are very proud of your opinion. Knowing that they have enjoyed their well-deserved rest, our gastronomy and the treatment of our great team is very important for us. Thank you for evaluating it so positively. Here we will be waiting for you. Sincerely, Hotel Areca.

title: Great Hotel & Facilities
review: If you're looking for a holiday hotel, this is not the one. It's 20 euro from the nearest beach each one, so I would only recommend this as an airport stop over.  A lot of comments on here about the breakfast with comments too from the hotel. The breakfast is disappointing. Scrambled eggs and bacon every day and the rest is croissants and dairy, gets very tedious after the 3rd day. If there were different types of egg, sausages, hash browns etc they could mix it up a little. The dinner meals are pretty average too, spag bol is just spag bol, ribs are just ribs. Chips are a few wedges.  There is no sun at this hotel, it is all in the shade as the garden is in the middle and no swimming pool.  The rooms are basic, small TV, scratches all over the desk etc. Not the end of the…

title: Close To Airport
review: Great little hotel directly looking on to the airport. Very modern inside and just off the motorway. Parking was free and underneath the hotel and the Spa facilities are great considering the reasonable low cost of the hotel. Sauna, Steam and jets in small indoor pool was great the morning before travelling. Breakfast was very good too and staff very friendly. I would stay again. The only issue is the Spa you have to take your towel from the room as there are no towels downstairs, and the whole area between the changing rooms and pool area became very wet and slippery.

title: good quality hotel
review: Dear Gareth. Thank you very much for sharing your assessment with the other tripadvisor users. We are happy to know that your stay met all your expectations and that you want to stay with us again. We will be happy to assist you. I take this opportunity to inform you that towels are available at reception for use in the spa. It is not necessary to use the one in the room. Sincerely, Hotel Areca.

title: An overnight stay near the Airport
review: We had to drop people off at Alicante Airport and pick some one up the next morning so we decided to stay over night. Friends had recommended this Hotel as a nice place to stay and convenient to the airport. We paid €69.70 which was a bit expensive for an overnighter but it had a pool and Spa so we thought it would pass the time nicely. When we got there we found a parking space right outside the door but had we wanted to park in the Hotels own parking we would have been charged €5 which i hadnt expected. When we tried to check in we were asked for our passports and as we'd driven from Mojacar we hadn't brought them This was apparently a major issue as you cannot stay in a Spanish Hotel without showing photo ID. Either a Spanish (not English) Driving licence or a Passport.  …

title: Great overnightplace for Alicante airport
review: The Areca hotel is conveniently situated near the road to Alicante airport and easy to find. We were warmly welcomed by reception staff and were quickly in our smart, modern and very clean room providing walk-in shower separate toilet, safe, fridge and smallish TV.   Wi-Fi was open but thought it wasn't working then realised you had to sign in from browser which is always a hassle from my laptop.   There is plenty of street parking which apparently is safe. There is also a parking garage.  There is a shuttle bus to the airport for which they charge 9€, but it wasn't working on the day we needed it.  Taxi to the airport costs 12€ during the week 14€ at weekends. A very short ride!   Not much in the "mini bar" fridge but they only charged 1€ for a Coke. Very fair indeed!.  There…

title: Good but very noisy elevator
review: Dear johnash. Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at Hotel Areca. We are very happy to see that everything was to your liking and that you value our facilities and staff's attention so positively. We hope you keep visiting us. We will be happy to assist you again. Sincerely, Hotel Areca.

title: No sleep in this so called boutique hotel
review: We were pleasantly surprised by the look of the hotel once inside. And by the very friendly staff, both at reception and in the bar/restaurant. We had requested a quiet room and were given a room without a view (#302) but not facing the street anyway. We didn't mind the fact that we had no view. We just wanted a good night's sleep before our flight early the next morning. I'm so glad I brought earplugs because of the extremely loud and annoying noise coming from the elevator shaft. Very, very unpleasant! The room was very warm and the airconditioning wasn't on yet. When I book a hotel with airconditioning, I expect it to work, even if the locals think the weather isn't warm enough yet.  Our booking included breakfast which was very good. Another pro is their shuttle to the…

title: Unexpectedly rather special
review: Dear Amoboseli. First of all thank you for the time spent in reporting your opinion about your recent stay with us. Thank your positive assessment towards the treatment of employees. Regarding the noise that we mentioned we are investigating that it could be since we have checked that from the room you can not hear the elevator engine and regarding the air conditioning please note that we have some temperatures between 24º and 12º for this reason this machine is turned off as we have complaints in both directions and it is the most appropriate thing we can do. In any case we apologize for the inconvenience you have had during your stay and we thank you for having stayed with us. We hope to have the opportunity to receive you again and try to reach your maximum satisfaction. Sincerely, Hotel Areca.

title: nice airport hotel, bit expensive
review: Spent one night between flights. Paid 82 Euros without breakfast and without shuttle to and from the airport. So all in all, a bit on the expensive side for a one night stay in the middle of nowhere.  shuttle to the hotel is 9 Euros single trip. Had a room on the first floor, just above the hotel entrance on the street side. a bit noisy in the morning with all the hotel deliveries going on.

title: Back again!
review: We always stay here when we have an early flight out from Alicante airport. The rooms are clean, well furnished and comfortable and the reception staff always remember us which is quite impressive. As it was early in the season when we stayed the outdoor restaurant was closed which is a shame so we ate in the bar. The menu choice was not great but the entrecote was very good and the service was o.k. Because the hotel is clean, reasonable price and has nice staff we would always stay here before an early flight. The parking on the street is no problem. We were told (again) that coffee is available at 5 a.m. but have not been able to get this for the last few years.......even though we were told it is available! We noticed this visit that we could hear a lot of other guests…

title: Good location for the airport
review: We found this hotel as we had a late arrival at Alicante airport and didn’t want to drive the 2 hours to our final destination. Street parking was available in front of the hotel and its only a short drive from the airport. It’s also easy to access the A7 motorway.   The hotel is modern and very good value although the breakfast was a bit expensive for Spain.  Would stay here again.

title: Great place to stay for early flight.
review: The hotel is modern and fresh. The room was clean and quiet. Staff was friendly and helpfull. The Food was not so great and the indoor pool was a bit small. Lovely backyard. We only had a one night stay, because of a early flight the next day. The hotel was Perfect for this.

title: Best place to stay for Alicante Airport departures!
review: a friendly and decent quality hotel - clean and tidy rooms with everything you need for an overnight stay - though could really do with tea/coffee making facilities, but you can get coffee in the cafe by reception most of the time. Hotel offers smoking rooms too which will please some people. You can park outside the hotel at no charge but it is on street parking - not sure about leaving the car for longer than one or two nights. Loved the fact that the hotel is in a small town so somewhere for you to walk around with lots of bars and restaurants - though the hotel restaurant is good too!

title: Excellent
review: Stayed for 3 nights. Great hotel, all of the staff were really friendly, rooms and public areas spotlessly clean and very comfortable. Bar and restaurant reasonably priced and the food is excellent. Very popular with the locals aswell.  Would highly recommend this hotel.

title: Overnight stay for early flight
review: Dear Mandy. Thank you for sharing your opinion with the other Tripadvisor users. We are very happy to know that you enjoyed a perfect stay. Thank you for trusting in our service and we hope to welcome you again very soon. Regards, Hotel Areca.

title: Holiday
review: Perfect location for airport and good standard hotel with friendly staff. Beds comfy and room clean and decent size. Torrellano itself was really quiet on a Sunday night but found the Irish bar and a lovely restaurant so made the stay even better. Had a drink at hotel bar which was reasonably priced. Lovely garden area which would be stunning in the warmer months. Could have sat out but a wee bit chilly, possible patio heaters would have made it comfortable. Would stay here again when flying early as it’s easy to find and less than 5 minutes from airport.

title: Bra läge för en övernattning inför tidigt flyg
review: Estimado cliente. Muchas gracias por compartir su opinión acerca de su estancia con nosotros. Nos alegramos mucho de leer sus buenos comentarios acerca de nuestras habitaciones, ubicación, restaurante y personal. En cuanto a las estufas por favor no dude es comentárselo a algún empleado del hotel para que las encendamos. Esperamos volver a verle. Atentamente, Hotel Areca.

title: Fab Hotel
review: Great hotel and friendly staff. Easier and cheaper to get to airport from city though, so partly defeated our purpose of airport hotel.  Managed to get an upgrade to suite for a minimal charge which was nice.

title: One night stay
review: Stayed for one night before flight from ALC back to London. Very friendly, helpful front desk staff. Nice, very clean & spacious room. Enjoyed Lunch, Dinner & Breakfast in the restaurant which was reasonably priced. Used their shuttle to the airport which was very reasonably priced at 9 euros. Will definitely stay again if in need for early flight.

title: Unimpressed
review: Dear customer. Thank you very much for sharing such an excellent comment about your stay. We are happy to know that the room and the treatment of our staff was to your liking. Our goal is to try to improve day after day to offer the best service to our customers. We hope to see you again soon. Sincerely, Hotel Areca.

title: Overnight after flight
review: We stayed here for 7 nights in November and were quite disappointed with our stay although it was very reasonably priced we would never class this as a 4* hotel. Coming from the UK where we stay in 4* hotels regularly and the standards are very high. A few negatives: - we booked a king size bed room and on the first night arrived to a twin room and were then offered a queen size bed room the next day for the rest of our stay. So we did not get what we had paid for. - the room was clean and basic but there was definite lack of complimentary facilities. Only shampoo and body wash. No coffee, tea, water etc or nothing. If you wanted something you had to pay for it. - Breakfast was very basic the only food on offer that someone has actually cooked was eggs and bacon everything else…

title: Over night stop
review: Dear Customer. First of all thank you for the time you have spent giving us your comment on tripadvisor. We regret that the stay has not been to your liking. Inform you that the selection of bed type is always low availability. As the day of your arrival there was no proposal to make the change the next day, I do not know if you requested it or they offered it to you from reception. Regarding the free products, explain that they really are the amenities and if you want another product logically they are under payment. Tea set € 5 per room, room service (€ 3 supplement), laundry, ironing, etc etc ... All these services are extra and carry a supplement. With regard to breakfast every day there are enough products to avoid being repetitive. 3 different types of pastries are offered, 3 of cheeses, 4 types of bread, 5 types of sausages, 4 types of cut fruit and 3 in complete pieces, scrambled eggs and beacon, 3 types of juices, 3 of milk, etc etc ... We will review the products that are offered for our clients that stay a week. In any case if you are staying with us we will be happy to make you a special breakfast to avoid this inconvenience. Our SPA is right which is small but has a 6x3 heated pool, Turkish bath and sauna plus changing rooms. The access is totally free for all our clients and we have just made a reform where, among other things, the entire floor has been changed. Once again we are sorry to read your review and we hope to have a new opportunity in the future to welcome you back. Sincerely, Hotel Areca.

title: Good airport hotel
review: We always use this hotel and the standard is always consistently good.  €11 is the taxi fare from Alicante airport at night and the shuttle bus to the airport costs €8 for 2 people.  We used the cafeteria for coffee and croissants at breakfast which was excellent and very reasonably priced.  Evening meals in the cafeteria also looked good.

title: Good hotel for airport stayW
review: We booked here as it was close to airport for our early morning flight. Room was small but functional and we got check in earlier than the late time of 4pm they advertise, so that was a bonus. Very clean and comfortable and wifi access in room was excellent. Only problem we found was the shower, ended up with the floor and bath mat soaking due to the bad design of shower. Also no tea or coffee making in room, not even a complimentary bottle of water which would have been a nice touch, but staff at reception very friendly and we booked the airport shuttle next morning which was cheaper than the taxi at E9 and very efficient. Great choice for eating out within 2 to 5 minutes walk from hotel.

title: 2 day stay
review: Room comfortable and reasonably quiet although movement of furniture did keep me awake with the early or late comings and goings.  Found beds rather hard for me. Our shower did not have a full door so it was rather chilly - found this rather odd. Missed the use of tea/coffee making facilities although now see there is a room option now to include such...at a price!  Ate at hotel for evening meals - enjoyed the experience and food was tasty. Unlike some guests, found the breakfast gave a plentiful choice and had no complaints. We made a mistake and boarded the wrong train to Alicante after purchasing our ticket at the station via a machine.  No attendant for any advice and no other travellers to ask either. In error we boarded the inter-city train and the ticket inspector charged…

title: Short stay after flight
review: Dear Awjlove. First of all thank you for the time spent in sharing your assessment about your stay. In all our rooms there is no door for the washbasin (if for the toilet area) since the original design was to make more spacious and comfortable rooms, we regret that it is not to your liking. Regarding the tea set, I commented that its service has been modified, being included in all our executive and junior suite rooms and in the rest of the rooms it has a supplement of € 5. You only have to ask our reception staff to leave it in your room. I apologize if you were awakened by the noise of the furniture but we do not know what could be due as our cleaning staff starts at 10am and during the days of your stay there were no works at the hotel, it could be something from abroad. In any case let us know as soon as possible to give you some solution since the comfort and satisfaction of our customers is our priority. Sincerely, Hotel Areca.

title: Free upgrade but noisy
review: The hotel was clean, tidy, pleasant with a spacious and quiet room.  It was very close to the airport and the taxi was only 12 euro.  We had a late flight and chose this rather than travel late in the night.  The reception service was good and the breakfast was very good.  Lara cars delivered the car to the hotel which made our start to the day easy. Lara cars are recommended and good value, except that they fill the petrol tank which you pay and need to return it empty :-(

title: Comfortable and convenient
review: Dear Guest. Thank you for your excellent rating and comment on your experience in our Hotel. We are happy to know that we meet your expectations and find you in the best conditions. We hope to see you soon. Regards. Hotel Areca.

title: Lovely Hotel Near The Airport!!
review: We stayed here for 1 night following a late flight into Alicante before making our way the following day to another hotel for a wedding in Elche. We arrived at midnight and were checked in by a friendly guy at reception.  Our room was lovely. Very spacious and modern. The bed was huge and very comfy. There was a jacuzzi bath in our bathroom and a separate shower. Not the most powerful jacuzzi bath I have ever been in but it was ok. Robes and slippers also there for use.  The following morning we had breakfast. Breakfast was ok. Not a massive amount of choice but fine for what we needed.   The outdoor terraced area was closed while we were there for maintenance work but it looked beautiful and would have been lovely to sit out there.   We were hoping to use the spa that morning…

title: Stop over on way to airport
review: Arrived Friday lunchtime surprised that room was ready. Room very adequate for the one night. Missing tea and coffee facility which would have been handy. As with other reviews the menu was very limited I had the bolognaise which was grim and certainly not worth the money. Bread put on table without us asking and they charged for that too. I would use again if I had early flight. Taxi to airport at 5.30am cost nearly 15 Euro wow!  Spa area very small and steam room stunk! Also around pool wooden slats with holes causing severe trip hazard.

title: A lovely hotel to stay near airport
review: Dear Guest. First of all I would like to express our gratitude for making you aware of your experience at Hotel Areca. Your comments are our main tool to improve day by day and exceed the expectations of our customers. I regret the inconveniences that you have experienced during your stay, we will work on them so they will not be repeated. For this winter we have planned the remodeling of the SPA area. Remind you that our transfer service to the airport costs € 9 per room and public taxi € 13 approx. We hope to see you soon. Best regards.

title: Airport Hotel
review: We stay here when we have an early flight. We arrived feeling stressed from work. Had a lovely soak in the jacuzzi bath and rest. Eat in the garden which is very pretty and relaxing. A lovely meal and restful night ready for flight in morning.

title: Convenient for the Airport and 1st class
review: Dear Guest. Thank you very much for your excellent comment. We are happy to know that you had a pleasant evening and that we met our goal. Satisfied customers. We hope to see you soon. Regards.

title: Good hotel, close to airport (no shuttle) bit noisy (2nd floor)
review: Went here for a quick stopover arrived late. Nice reception rooms decent of size, free Wi-Fi and a good/average breakfast. Special note to the Nespresso Coffee machine (professional) for use with the breakfast. Pricing is good and worth it. Had a room next to the elevator and early in the morning it was quite noisy unfortunately. No shuttle service but Taxi.

title: Easy to find and good parking
review: Flying out of Alicante airport, this was an excellent choice.  We parked the car in their underground carpark - first night free and then €5 per night for each night we were away.  The shuttle took us to the airport early in the morning and we had prepaid €9 for this for two of us.  For some reason they would not pick us up again from the airport so we had to get a taxi, which was quite a bit more.  On reflection maybe if we had been staying a night on our return they would have picked us up, but we didn't think to ask why at the time.   We took a look at the spa but the heat hit us as we opened the door and we made a hasty retreat!  Much too hot in August.   Had a wander around the locality, which had several bars and cafés but decided to go back to the outdoor area of the…

title: Overnight stay
review: Our family stayed 6 nights in Valencia and travelled here for 1 night before flying early from Alicante airport. Beautiful hotel with clean, spacious rooms. Lovely garden area where we enjoyed a delicious evening meal. Unable to comment on breakfast as we left too early. Staff were very pleasant and helpful. We were impressed by all that we saw during our brief visit, so much so that we wished we'd spent 4 nights in Valencia and 3 nights here.

title: Airport overnight stay
review: At the beginning of August 2017 my family and myself stayed overnight at the Areca Hotel when we arrived very late at Alicante airport.  The ease of finding the hotel was so simple we could not have been more delighted, as we had had a long day traveling.  On arrival at the hotel the reception staff were very helpful and directed us immediately to the underground secure parking.  We were checked in within a few minutes and went to our rooms.  The rooms were an excellent size and a very generously sized bathroom in each room.  The rooms were spotlessly clean and the air conditioning worked superbly.  Plenty of towels and toiletries available in the room.  We all had a very comfortable sleep which we were most grateful for.  The breakfast was wonderful a very good variety of…

title: Convenient
review: Dear Rosina. Many thanks for sharing your excellent opinion of our hotel on Trip Advisor, it was a great pleasure to have you among us. We are happy that you have enjoyed our facilities and we are honored that you have been so comfortable at Hotel Areca. We remain at your disposal and waiting to greet you again. Receive a warm greeting, from the whole team.

title: Terrific hotel
review: Stayed one night prior to an early morning flight and what a treat it was. Lovely calm attentive staff with breakfast served in the garden. Lovely spa facilities only downside was pool was indoors. Will be back

title: Overnight stay Dropping family at airport
review: Dear Guest.Thank you so much for your time for such an excellent comment. We are very excited to know that we will see you again. Best regards.

title: Comfortable overnighter with good restaurant for dinner
review: We have used this hotel several times. It is convenient for the airport, it is a lovely modern hotel with excellent facilities.  We had a larger room this time with tea making facilities which was very useful

title: Great for an airport hotel
review: Dear Gi. Thank you for your time in evaluating your stay at Hotel Areca. We are very happy that you have us as a reference and hope to see you soon again. Regards.

title: Great for the airport!
review: Chosen for its proximity to Alicante airport, we were delighted with the accommodation (suite) and the package offered by the hotel which included dinner. A bottle of Cava was delivered to our room shortly after our arrival, and with the car safely parked in their underground garage we were safe to indulge. With dinner came another couple of free drinks of our choice. A love Spanish starters because they are so imaginative and unusual, and these did not disappoint. However the main course excelled all my expectations because of its delicacy and taste. Two salmon fillets in triangles in a type of terryiaki sauce was perfect. There's a chef in this restaurant who can cook! The dining room is set looking out at a beautiful garden with tall trees - banana, yucca and palm trees which…

title: Airport convenience
review: Ideal for a late arrival/early flight to/from Alicante airport. A 3 minute taxi ride away (10-15 euros depending on the time of day). Situated on the edge of the small town, the hotel is modern, clean and quiet. Some of the fittings are not of the highest quality, but this does not detract from its generally high standards. Some of the staff seemed uncomfortable speaking anything but Castillian.  The restaurant in the garden at the rear (Caribi) was an eye opener - stunningly good food in a quiet and pleasant location.

title: Great hotel and restaurant
review: We only stayed one night as a stopover for Alicante airport, but what a find! Modern, spotlessly clean and very friendly. Had dinner in the tropical garden which was beautiful and had a fantastic menu. We had the tasting menu and it was delicious and excellent value for money, highly recommended.

title: Hotel for a night
review: The Hotel Areca is great for an overnight stay before a flight. Its clean and tidy and the staff are very very welcoming. We ate there too and the degustation many is large and reasonably priced and pretty good quality to boot! The town of Torrellano is actually wee gem if you walk around it with a couple of very good Spanish restaurants with very good food. Only downside was the spa.....not top notch and needs a wee bit of tender loving care to bring it up to scratch. Overall still good for the money you pay and the people are lovely.

title: OK plus hotel close to Alicante airport
review: Spent two days at Areca Hotel on business. Can't say much about the neighborhood, but the hotel is nice. Rooms are clean and fresh, staff friendly, breakfast and lunch have limited options but tasty and good quality. 10 minutes by taxi from the airport.

title: Stopover
review: On organising my route from a 4 night stag do in Benidorm, I found this place. Within a 5 minute taxi to the airport and a nice air conditioned room. Staff really friendly I arrived on 3 hours sleep at 9.30am and they kindly found me a room!  Facilities were ok it was nice to relax in the pool but nothing impressive. Very average if you are looking for an actual spa hotel however at the price it's worth 4 stars for what you get

title: Another excellent visit to the Areca
review: Yet again we chose Areca for our winter visit to family in nearby El Altet. Delightful room. Helpful, friendly staff. Last time we stayed (February 2016) we went out for breakfast each morning to try some local cafes. This time we ate at the hotel. For €9 each we had an excellent choice of cereals, meats, cheeses, pastries, breads and hot and cold drinks. Service was excellent and the coffee among the best I've tasted! Later in our stay we sat in the bar for a drink with friends who had a toddler in tow. The little one is a busy little lad but the staff chatted to him as he trotted around and made us all feel welcome.  Looking forward to maybe another visit in January 2018

title: An overnight visit on way back to UK
review: My room was very pleasant and clean and comfortable.  The staff were friendly. The weather was appalling - it was the night of the big storm 13th March 2017. My meal in the restaurant was served by the chef and the waiter and nothing was too much trouble and the lamb shank I was served was well cooked, beautifuly presented and the staff were very kind and helpful. Although I did not have time to use it, the indoor health suite looked very inviting and I would definitely stay there again perhaps for more than one night to enjoy the ambience and the relaxing nature of the beautifully staffed and run hotel.. The hotel runs a shuttle to and from the airport at reasonable hours but taxis out of hours will charge 10 euros for a fare.

title: Convenient to Alicante airport
review: While this hotel is not on airport complex it is an easy to find short drive from the terminal Room spacious and comfortable Staff friendly and welcoming Areca is a modern contemporary hotel so nothing Spanish about it but if you're looking for a bed after a flight it's perfect and it's reasonable I paid 61 euros

title: Cosy, antique hotel with reasonable price
review: Gorgeous hotel in George Town. If you find cosy, antique and luxury hotel, you must stay here. You can enjoy a snug but fully equipped convenient room with antique furnitures and continental styled breakfast in a calm and beautiful restaurant placed at the end of the pretty corridor.

title: Ideal for airport
review: modern hotel, has some underground parking but we parked on the road. About 5 minute drive to the airport. Room was nice, clean and modern. I have no complaints and would stay here again. Checked in late due to delayed flight but no problem

title: Good stop over hotel
review: Arrived late at night, a few minutes taxi drive from the airport.  Reception efficient, room comfortable, breakfast good. Nice little garden area with bar facilities. Price was good - under 100 euro B&B If u need a hotel stop over for the airport this will do the job very well.

title: A delightful surprise
review: We ve been there just for one day. It s been a surprise for us. Excellent facilities, relaxing spa and nice terrace with good service and food.  Ready to help and nice staff. Couldn't ask for more at this price!!

title: Ideal location
review: Arriving in the early evening this was a very convenient place as a stop over - just a 12 euro taxi ride from Alicante airport when arriving in the early evening. Staff were very welcoming and attentive.  The restaurant is very good and eating outside in the sheltered garden was a delight.  The indoor pool provided an inviting interlude and for those feeling energetic, there is a small but well equipped gym!  The hotel was very good value and an ideal base to tour the area and visit the many attractions nearby.

title: First visit & we have a great time
review: First visit. The hotel is very clean with very friendly staff. Fantastic service, impeccable housekeeping.  The buffet breakfast is very good with a wide selection of food & drinks and worth the money, though the dinner is expensive. Good location to the airport, restaurants, bars, shops & many sight seeing places.  We have enjoyed staying there, for me 5 nights & for my guests 6 nights. The children love the swimming pool though they commented that the pool is too small, should be able to swim in it but we have enjoyed it & the sauna. There is ample car parking space outside the hotel. Will definitely come back if we need to.

title: Second visit
review: The hotel has a cool vibe and great garden for cocktails in the summer. Rooms are modern and clean with super comfy beds. Staff are friendly and courteous and happy to recommend local restaurants if you want to step out of the hotel.   The buffet breakfast is extensive and has everything you could wish for.   The hotel also has a spa which I have not experienced yet, maybe next time

title: Great Place To Stay After a Long Flight
review: We arrived at the hotel after traveling for 25 hours. Our room was ready and very comfortable. We had a light dinner in the cafe and settled in for a much needed rest. The staff in both the restaurant and hotel were great. They knew we were tired and when out of their way to make our stay comfortable. Breakfast the next morning was fresh, plentiful and varied. We returned to the hotel for two nights a month later. Once again our room was ready, very clean and quiet. We took the train into Alicante the next day for a final visit to this beautiful city. The train stop is a five minute walk from the hotel. We returned to the hotel after a day of touring and once again had a meal in the cafe. The following morning our taxi to the airport was waiting for us at 5:45 am.  This is a…

title: Stop over
review: Excellent hotel clean very friendly staff Good location to Alicante airport 11 euro taxi fare  would stop here again for early morning flight lots of good places to eat and drink in local town close to hotel

title: Convenient, by longshot Best hotel in the area
review: I have gait/walking challenges (stroke); accom. has to be convenient to shopping and/or sights. Perfect location close to the airport, base for sightseeing. August fiesta time was superb; wow-ed by stunning festivities Elche; also Alicante, Santa Pola. Best hotel in the area by a longshot. Didn't spend a lot of time at the hotel, but ambience was great, modern, good facilities.  Good food options are closeby, great parking - free.

title: Excellent stay booked another on check out
review: Stayed at Areca straight off a late evenng flight from the UK. Very near to the airport and fancied a good night's sleep before heading to the airport to pick up a hire car.  Very friendly staff at check in. Room was very clean and comfortable.  Had a light meal in the bar - very good service from waiter Pedro.  Great sleep and the breakfast was very good too.  In fact we liked it so much that we booked another night there at the end of our holiday.  Excellent value for money and very friendly and attentive staff. A gem of a hotel.

title: Valentine treat
review: Dear Guest. We thank you for your excellent comment about our hotel as the opinions of our guests are very important to us. We are glad to know that we exceeded your expectations and that you repeat night with us. We hope to see you again. Thank you so much for everything. Sincerely,

title: Perfect stay
review: Stayed for a night because of the near to the airport. Good parking outside, top team at the reception. Checkin was quickly done. Got a room , spacious and spotless clean. Well equipped, good maintained. Water pressure good, temperatures were good. Bed was super comfy, good range of tv channels, a lots of power plugs. Strong and complementary wifi. Perfect breakfast. No noises from the airport. Around the hotel good range of restaurants  Recommended place to be

title: Excellent
review: Dear MArco. Many thanks for your detailed comment about your stay at Hotel Areca. We are pleased that our clients value so positively all the services and facilities that we offer and have enjoyed all of them. Thank you very much for your recommendation and we hope to see you again. Best regards.

title: Unexpected, but excellent, stay
review: I was really very impressed with this charming hotel.  We had a particularly warm welcome from reception when we arrived.  The two girls couldn't have been more helpful or charming and spoke excellent English.  We had asked for a double bedded room and as they only had twins we were upgraded to a junior suite, which was extremely comfortable.    We chose to eat in the hotel restaurant and had the degustation menu, which was extremely reasonable and included a bottle of wine.  The food was delicious, well presented and served by attentive, professional staff.  The hotel itself is attractively designed and is located very close to the airport.  We will definitely be staying at this hotel again as we were so very very impressed with its high standard, comfort and superb food.

title: Very Nice Hotel and Restaurant
review: We had an unexpected stay at this hotel on 30th December after our flight was cancelled.  Swissport/Flybe told us that they’d be putting us into a hotel for the night.   It was nearly 9pm when a coach full of us were dropped at the door and I did wonder what kind of chaos we would find all trying to get in at once.  But I cannot find fault with the way we were looked after by the staff.  The receptionist had us checked in very quickly and not long after that we sat having dinner.  And it was really nice.  The rooms were all ok – the bathroom and door situation that you read about in other reviews was a bit weird, but when you were as tired and grateful as we were to have a bed, you can look past it.  The bed was very comfortable.  No real noise from inside or outside of the…

title: Great hotel
review: Stayed one night at the Areca before a flight out of Alicante to Madrid. The room was spacious, clean and modern. The bed was a little firm for my taste yet I slept well. The shower did not have a privacy door between it and the room and the shower stall had a 3/4 clear glass door. The shower also did not have a shelf for toiletries yet I was able to place such on the shower fixture. We had the Pollo Club Sandwhich with Huevo and fires and it was fantastic! Shuttle from the hotel to airport runs every 30 minutes and costs 9 euros per room. Overall an excellent stay and good value.

title: Good for a night stay
review: The hotel is close to the airport and thus very handy when we had a late flight.  The rooms were large and tidy with a good bathroom (some bathrooms didn't have doors). Our room had a lingering smell of cigarettes, but as we were tired it didn't make much difference.  Room service was good and to a fair standard.  Parking was a little tight but secure and easy to find.

title: Nice hotel near Alicante airport at a reasonable price
review: The English-speaking staff that met me at reception were quick to answer my questions and get me my key, which meant I was installed in record time, arranging a five-o-clock taxi to the airport at the same time.  I dropped my things off and went to say goodbye to the people that had dropped me off.  Walking back up to the hotel, I noticed a guy smoking from the room window next mine (what was he thinking?) and dread descended. I needn't have worried as there was no trace of smoke in my room.  The room itself was a business room and relatively large; the decor was modern and pleasant. The bathroom was a strange affair as the shower was open plan into the bedroom. As I was travelling alone, this wasn't a problem, but it might have been if you're self conscious. This also made the…

title: Perfect for airport sleepover
review: This hotel really is close to the airport-just a few minutes drive away. We expected something basic ,but were pleasantly surprized . Its smart and stylish with a good restaurant with good food and service,The gardens looked an inviting place for Summer dining. We parked just outside by the roadside. Our room was large and airy with an opening window and extra large comfy bed. Stylish bathroom area with hot shower. The basin is in full view from the bed and yes the loo has a frosted glass door with no soundproofing.Must have seemed a good idea on the drawing board, but its not what people want! Joy of joys there was a KETTLE  -so unusual in Spain,so well done there.I would take your own longlife milk.Tv was better than normal with international news.

title: Excellent Value for Money
review: My husband and I recently spent a night at the Areca Hotel, Elche having arrived into Alicante airport late at night.  We were greeted by a very friendly and professional gentlemen at reception and were in our room within minutes.  Our room was spotlessly clean and modern.  Our bed extremely comfortable and the bathroom was equally clean with an excellent shower (no bath).  We slept well and next morning headed down to the dining room for breakfast.  Breakfast is self service with a very large choice of meats/breads/cheeses/pastries plenty to start the day.  On leaving we were bade farewell and we on our way.  We paid 55 euro for both of us overnight including breakfast.  I can honestly said staying at the Areca Hotel was probably the best value for money we have experienced in…

title: Areca hotel
review: Regular user, good location, good accommodation, good food at reasonable price. Torrellano is a nice small town with lots of restaurants/bars...it is only 3 minutes transit time to the airport. Thoroughly recommend.

title: Superb value minutes from the Airport
review: Arriving at Alicante airport late in the evening we needed a local hotel. This one was fantastic value super clean, very friendly staff and good sized well equipped rooms. Nice outside eating area. front desk arranged our hire car no fuss and very efficient.

title: Convenient for airport
review: Excellent location for airport so good if you have an early morning flight.  Helpful receptionist. Nice, clean room. Good restaurant. Good spa with small pool and sauna. Not much to do locally. Car parking. Paid €5 extra for tea making facilities.  Would recommend

title: Fab for a short stay.
review: Great for a short stay. Really clean and tidy, polite staff. Very close to the hotel. Not much around the hotel itself. The odd restaurant, takeout and a shop. Bus stop right outside to pop into town. Lovely outside area.

title: Stopover
review: Dear Guest.  Thank you for your comment and rate on tripadvisor.  We hope to see you again.  Sincerely,

title: Nice Hotel
review: Early flight out of Alicante so needed somewhere close to airport. Can't complain at all.  Well appointed rooms, quiet, friendly and attentive staff..managed to squeeze in a visit to the Spa! Restaurant quite upmarket but food pretty good and well priced.  Outdoors cafe/garden restaurant very tranquil and spacious.  For the price we paid this hotel is excellent value and we woukd definitely book again.

title: Overnight stay
review: Very nice hotel..close to the airport..nice buffet breakfast..friendly and helpful staff. Rooms are modern, clean and nicely furnished. There's a nice little restaurant on the premises and has a nice lobby area with plenty of seating if you don't wish to sit in your room.  Only complaint would be that the mattresses are not the best I the world and if I had to stay more than a couple of nights it could be a problem.

title: Overnight stay
review: We chose this hotel to stay in overnight as we were catching an early flight home after a weeks holiday in Calpe. It is clean, and the have a good selection for breakfast. The staff are friendly too. It is conveniently close to the airport for catching an early flight I highly recommend this hotel and the price is very reasonable.

title: Four star hotel without the use of restaurant and bar??
review: Dear Customer.  Thank you very much for your comment on Tripadvisor about our Hotel Areca.  We are glad that we have covered your expectations and enjoy your stay with us despite being the last day of vacation.  For your next visit we recommend you visit our restaurant.  We hope to see you soon.  Sincerely,

title: Value for money in Torrellano
review: We returned to this hotel on Saturday after our visit last year was such a success. We'd loved the restaurant and wanted to sample it again. However, this year we were disappointed to be told that the restaurant and bar could not be used because of a wedding. It is my understanding that a four star hotel should provide these facilities. We had not been warned before we arrived that this would be the case so we were very disappointed. An excellent hotel which we would have rated five star if a bar and restaurant were available.

title: An excellent hotel
review: Dear Customer.  We regret not been able to enjoy his last visit in our restaurant Carabí.  As we said we had a wedding that night which occupied spaces available.  We expect and hope to see you again at our hotel and to taste our new restaurant menu.  Sorry for the inconvenience that we have caused.  Sincerely,

title: Last night stay before flying home
review: My wife booked this hotel for the last night of our 2-week holiday.  We were staying in Javea (about a 90 minute drive north from Alicante) but because our return flight was at 8 am we decided to book a hotel near to the airport for our last night to avoid a long drive in the dark which we would have to have undertaken c 2.30 am.  The hotel is conveniently located just a five-minute drive from the airport.  It is 4-star, tastefully furnished in a modern design, rooms very comfortable, and the most delightful courtyard garden were we had one of the tasiest meals of our whole trip and at a very reasonable price.  Staff were without exception extremely friendly and helpful, and we would definitely stay there again.  Our two children (aged 16 and 13) were suitably impressed and we…

title: Close to the airport
review: Dear Paul.  Thank you very much for record their stay with us, we are glad that you enjoyed your last day of travel.  We work so that all our customers enjoy in our hotel and our restaurant in which we have great enthusiasm.  Thank you for choosing us and we hope to see you on your next trip to Spain.  Best Regards,

title: Ideal location for Alicante airport
review: We stayed here for one night between for flights.  Check in was a little laboured as the people in front of us appeared to have some issue which involved the receptionist at one point speaking on two telephones as well as to these people.  The room we had was clean but basic, however it could do with a door on the bathroom and in order to fill the bath my son had to walk up the edges of the bath to get to the taps as there was a rather large wall in the way - maybe best to stick to a shower!    Breakfast was good and they arranged transport back to the airport for 9 Euro.

title: Very convenient for Alicante airport
review: Dear Paul.  Thank you very much for letting us a comment, help us to improve and try to make our customers enjoy in our hotel.  We regret the delay in the check-in caused by a problem in another client.  Tell that we are aware of the problems of the bathroom doors and we expected an improvement on this issue.  Except hope these details have been enjoying our excellent restaurant Mediterraneo, Spa and Gym of our Hotel.  We hope to see you soon.

title: Great Airport Hotel
review: I just stayed one night so I could get to Alicante airport in the morning. My hotel room was lovely and clean and I got some food brought to my room which was lovely. I paid €9 to get the shuttle bus to the airport, which is only a couple of minutes away.

title: Unexpected gem!
review: We booked a last minute room at Areca Hotel, and it was fantastic. We had an excellent dinner at the hotel's restaurant, and the rooms are very nice and modern. The restaurant was unexpectedly fine dining in a casual outdoor setting, very reasonably priced too. Hotel is very close to the airport as well, would definitely recommend!

title: Good for an early flight at the airport
review: We stayed here the night before a 6am flight from Alicante airport , the hotel was very efficient and clean and the bed extremely comfortable , the hotel booked us a 4am taxi which was there 5 mins early and our trip to the airport was less than 5minutes! So it doesn't get any more convenient. There are a few bars and cafes within a 5 minute walk from the hotel and we had some excellent and very inexpensive tapas I would highly recommend if you need to be close to the airport for an early flight.

title: nice hotel
review: fresh breakfast and nice water circuit, just one thing that I have to say maybe is not the hotel but I get the reservation from internet and they sale the reservation including the taxi ( to the airport ) but wasn't like that, I payed 9euros extra, so be careful !

title: A one night stopover.
review: I stayed here for one night as I had an early flight from Alicante airport the following morning and it was convenient.  The reviews looked good also.  I found the staff very helpful and courteous and the hotel overall was very nice and well located.  I was disappointed in my room however.  It smelt of stale cigarettes and it certainly wasn't a room with a view!  My window faced on to a wall so I just kept the curtains closed.  The bed was comfortable and the room was clean, although I did spot some hair in the shower tray.  Finally, there were noisy people in the next room who kept banging their door throughout the night and speaking very loudly which disturbed my sleep. Overall my experience was good though and for convenience I would stay again.

title: First Class. What a find!
review: We stayed here after driving down from Ontinyent to get an early morning flight. Check in was fast and fuss free ( Booked through Booking.com) and very professional. We wandered along into town for a few beers and to look for somewhere to eat but I had already spotted the lovely garden dining area at the hotel so we wandered back to the hotel to check out the menu. Staff were helpful and friendly and said we could dine later or have a snack in the cafe if we needed food there and then but we decided to dine in the garden restaurant which opens at 7:30 on Fridays and weekends. In a beautiful setting with soft music and the sound of a fountain as a backdrop, we chose from the interesting menu and enjoyed the surroundings while having an aperitif. We had a three course meal with a…

title: Airport hotel
review: Arrived late from the airport. Staff were very helpful and food was available in the bar at a reasonable price. Room was comfortable and breakfast good. Parking was on the road outside. Rooms were 'family' though my friend and I had a room each No tea making facilities in rooms

title: Don't miss out on Fabulous Accommodation
review: We only stopped for a night after a late flight in from Ireland, What a treat, A warm welcome at reception, a lovely room. Had a very pleasant bottle of wine, with olives, in the lovely garden courtyard. The restaurant was open until 11:00pm, but we were not hungry so we didn't try it out. In the morning we were anxious to get back home to our dogs, so again cannot comment on the quality of the food

title: Close to the airport
review: This hotel is very close to the airport , so very convenient for my overnight stay before my morning flight. The reception staff were very polite and helpful. As I was travelling alone I wanted to eat in the restaurant, though the whole experience was not good. They had a function on for most of the day so the hotel guests were pretty much ignored. Dinner was served up very late and the quality of food was not brilliant. The waiter seemed to find it inconvenient to have to serve hotel guests and would throw things down onto the table... Not very friendly at all. The room was clean, quiet and comfortable, so no complaints there. Would I stay again? Probably not.

title: Great hotel!
review: Really pleasant suprise!!! A very good hotel in a very small town. Book this hotel because it was close to the airport.... Ir was so perfect and service friendly......and  The restaurang was good! Thanks

title: Another visit: Food not great!
review: Stay here as it is so close to the airport, good value and friendly staff who speak English very well. Room was, as always clean and comfortable. Decided to have a drink before dinner (we normally stay away from hotel bars and take our own!) Was reminded why we do this......asked for a couple of double gins with fresh orange. Bar tender took a while to understand this, giving us 2 glasses of awful 'from concentrate' orange before understanding that we also wanted gin, took a couple of requests before we actually got what we wanted and was then presented with a bill for 19 euros!!!! Having had many gin & oranges in Spain this is definitely the most by at least double we have ever been charged. Disappointed to find that the outside dining area was not open (due to weather! It was…

title: Have used this hotel many times
review: I am currently on my year abroad, and as there is no direct flights from Valencia to Glasgow, therefore it's easier to travel to Alicante and catch a direct flight. I have used this hotel many times, as it is fairly cheap. The breakfast is branded stuff and therefore the quality is slightly better.  When my parents were booked in, and I reserved a room almost 4 months later, they gladly found us two rooms together.  All the staff speak good English and are willing to help. On one occasion with my mum, I had asked for "normal tea" and they were more than accommodating for us, even if we did get some strange looks pouring milk into tea.  Only downside is different receptionists have told me different things about the minibus. For example, one told me it started at 9 and another…

title: Areca Hotel is a comfortable hotel very close to Alacante airport
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for your comments.  With regards to the information about the bus, we have now informed all the staff about the correct times to get the bus. Sorry for the confusion we might have caused.  We are very happy that you continue trusting on us during all these years, and we hope to continue welcoming you quite more!  Best regards!!

title: Excellent staff, service and food.
review: We stayed in Areca Hotel as we had early flights from Alacante.  The hotel is very comfortable, with friendly, helpful staff.  There is a basement pool, which has spa features and is great for relaxing but less good for swimming.  The steam room and sauna were welcomed by tired travellers. It was an excellent place to end our holiday without stress.  There is even a shuttle to the airport!

title: Very close to alicante airport
review: Dear guest,  thank you very much for your interest in Areca Hotel.  We are pleased to know that your experience with us was comfortable and stressless.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you very soon.  Best regards!

title: Nice hotel, pity about the food
review: Stayed here for one night to catch an early flight from Alicante. First impressions were of a spacious, modern, clean lobby leading to a garden area at the rear. Reception staff were excellent, quickly checking us in,arranging an early call and a taxi for our early start, as well as arranging a takeaway breakfast for us due to our early departure. Room was very clean and airy, well decorated with comfy bed. We had wine and tapas in the cafeteria area which was excellent and good value for money, before dining later in the Caribe restaurant. Again, service was excellent with staff attentive and pleasant and the food top order. Room service was swift and inexpensive. Check out without a hitch and our taxi driver waiting in reception. Overall, an excellent experience and we would…

title: Very convenient
review: Stayed over night after a late flight arrival at Alicante. Friendly welcome, clean modern room, excellent breakfast. Can't fault it really. Only one minor gripe, and this applies to a lot of modern hotels, can the designers please bear in mind that some people, particularly the older generation, prefer their bathrooms to be enclosed and not part of the bedroom!

title: Friendly staff, noisy hotel rooms
review: Dear Sirs,  thank you very much for your nice comments!! We are very happy to know that our hard work is yielding results!    However, we are aware that there is still much work to be done.  Thank you very much for your trust and we hope to welcome you very soon.  Best regards!!

title: Noisy
review: The hotel is conveniently located just outside Alicante and very close to the airport.  Unfortunately, although the room we had was clean and tidy, the decor was looking tired, light wooden coloured laminate flooring had gaps where the planks of wood were separating. Again, with the wooden floors, this was very noise when walking on and we could hear other guests walking around.  The room is open plan with no door on the shower cubical and a frosted swinging door to the toilet.  The lift could be heard and doors to other guests rooms slammed shut at all hours of the night.  Other guests could be heard through the walls while we were trying to sleep. The reception and communal areas including the dining area are very clean and tidy.  The breakfast buffet has a good continental…

title: At Least they listen
review: Dear guest,  thank you very much for your interest and wide description of our facilities and service.  We take note about your comments about the rooms, and we'll consider them in order to do improvements on it.   Thank you very much for giving your feedback and we hope to welcome you very soon.  Best regards!

title: Holup
review: Stayed here last night. People above me moved furniture for hours above me - I cannot imagine these were guests but rather hotel staff doing some work.  Elevator near room also made lots of noise . Room was hot with no way to cool it down .  Horrible experience .

title: Convenient for a visit to our family
review: 5 minutes drive from my family in El Altet (staying here meant the grandchildren didn't have to share a bedroom at home!); 10 minutes drive from Alicante Airport; 4 minute walk to train station. Spotlessly clean; friendly, helpful staff.  Only quibbles:  a) Aircon didn't work properly although we tried every combination of controls imaginable; window stays open only if you slide back the (very effective) blackout blinds so room was hot even in January. b) We were told there'd be a kettle in the room - there wasn't but a kettle, cups and bottled water arrived within minutes of us asking. Silly thing was that the kettle and cups were removed by the cleaner every day so we had to keep asking for them! Eventually we left a note, in Spanish, saying, "Please leave the kettle and cups…

title: Lovely hotel close to Alicante airport
review: Dear Sirs,  Thank you very much for your interest and for your comments.  We are really sorry for not being at our best level on the things you have described. We'll do our best to give you the best service as possible in your next visit.  Very best regards,  The management

title: Great for Alicante airport - but not quiet!
review: We were put up in this lovely hotel for 2 nights when our flight was cancelled by Ryanair on 26th January.  The hotel is very nice with a small indoor pool and spa with steam room and sauna.  Breakfast was very nice and food in the bar was also very good and not too pricey.  The staff in this hotel were excellent, a special mention to the the young girl on reception who was so helpful and friendly, she spoke good english and helped us to print off boarding tickets and arranged taxi to airport etc.,  There was a lot of nice restaurants and shops in the resort and the train station is a short walk from hotel.

title: Enjoyed our stay here
review: Dear guest,   Thank you very much for your nice comments.  We have informed our staff about your opinion. We are all very happy to know that you had a nice and comfortable stay among us.  We hope to see you very soon around.  Best regards!

title: Fantastic hotel  5 stars
review: This hotel is only 5-10 minutes from Alicante airport so is great if you have an early morning flight. The rooms are spacious and clean and quite modern. The sound-proofing both between rooms and for external noise is poor. The restaurant is fine and the cafeteria offers good value.

title: Excellent hotel within 5 minutes drive of Alicante airport
review: Very reasonably priced, modern comfortable hotel which is the closest to Alicante airport of various hotels I have stayed.  It was great after getting lost on previous trips from various hotels in Elche, Alicante town and Alicante hills, to access the airport so easily.  Has a small swimming pool which is free and has a jacuzzi and sauna.  Rooms facing the courtyard are away from the main roads. Restaurant and bars in Torrellana are withing walking distance.  Torrellana also has a garage for filling up a hire car.  Will definitely stay again.

title: Very Good Quality Airport Hotel :)
