review: Thank you very much for your comments.  We are very happy that your experience with us was according to your expectations.  We look forward to welcoming you again very soon.  In the meantime, we remain  With best regards!

title: Mrs Margaret Burns
review: We had a late flight into Alicante and didn't want to do the drive so booked into the Areca for the night. First and importantly for an airport hotel, great value for money. We paid 47.50 euro for a double room. On arrival the reception staff were friendly and helpful. The room was a good size, large, comfy bed and a very nice shower room. Everything was clean but there were significant signs of wear and tear in the room. We didn't have supper at the hotel but did have drinks in the bar which is recommended. Like reception, the staff were friendly and charming. We didn't have breakfast at the hotel as it looked a little expensive, we drove to the nearest cafe and had coffee and croissant for 2 for 4 euro - and it was good! Finally the taxi fare from the airport was 13.40 euro…

title: Last minute booking
review: Dear guest,  thank you very much for your comments.  With regards to your comments about the breakfast, it's important to know that we also offer the possibility to have breakfast in our cafeteria, ordering only the products you prefer:  a coffee and toast, or whatever suits you.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you very soon.  Best regards!

title: The third room that we were offered was lovely but not the first 2 rooms!
review: This hotel won an award from you in 2010 No idea why? Our visit was a disaster. We booked a double room which was actually a twin room with the 2 single beds pushed together. The beds were hard and lumpy. The food was appalling, undercooked and cold and they couldn't evenue provide a cup of tea other than herbal. The shower room offered no privacy as was open into the room with no door on it.

title: Relaxing overnight stay very close to airport!
review: Great hotel with very friendly, helpful staff! Comfortable and very quiet room with window to iner courtyard. Spotlessly clean. Spent a while in the spa area in the afternoon. Good buffet breakfast served from 7.00 am. Literally 5 mins from Alicante airport and with both on site & street parking. Short walk to restaurants/bars/shops. Will stay again!

title: Excellent hotel
review: Thank you very much for your comments!!  We are happy that you found everything according to your expectations.  We look forward to welcome you very soon.  In the meantime, we remain with best regards!

title: Great value if you want an airport hotel
review: We stayed for one night in this 4 star hotel. It was only 5 mins from the airport so very handy. We stayed in a junior suite. We were attracted to the hotel by its Spa. We were disappointed when we went to use it at 3.15pm only to be told it did not open until 5.00pm. There was no information on the website about this.  We went back at 5.15pm and the sauna and steam room were still not on so we missed out on this.  The room was fantastic.  we had dinner in the hotel restaurant and the food was great.

title: Alicante Airport hotel
review: Dear Sir,  First of all, thank you very much for your interest and the nice comments about your stay.  We are really sorry that you couldn't enjoy our Spa. Since we have our new website, it seems our colleagues didn't updated that information. We are now fixing that problem.  Please do not hesitate to contact me in your next visit, and greet you personally. You can email me at direccion@hotelareca.es  Best regards!

title: Does What it Says on the tin
review: Excellent facilities, modern, new and cheap, within 5 minutes of Alicante airport. Has a small restaurant on site, with a bar that serves food until 11 pm.   Highly recommended, will use again.   Free wifi and nice breakfast buffet included. Parking available outside (on the street but didn't have trouble finding a space).

title: Great spot by the airport and entry to motorway network
review: Stayed for 2 nights as part of a business trip.  Staff were exceptionally helpful, particularly the desk staff who helped me plan in routes to my satellite navigation system. secure car parking onsite.   Evening dining is  a little restrictive for a solo traveller as a number of dishes were for 2 people minimum, but there are eateries up the main street near the hotel.  Room was very clean, comfortable enough and plenty of hot water for showers

title: Great for stopover at airport!
review: Thank you very much for your comments! We look forward to welcoming you very soon.  Best regards!

title: Perfect for stop over near Alicante Airport
review: Landed late into airport so decided to stay local before collecting car next morning !   Great for stopover near airport , 10 Euro each way in taxi ! Rooms very clean with great showers  and staff friendly!   As it was late we didn't try the bar or restaurant but they looked fine !   Would stay here again !

title: Very Good
review: Thank you for your comments!!  Looking forward to welcoming you soon.  Kind regards!

title: Clean and modern hotel
review: Good quality hotel at a very reasonable room rate. Staff very pleasant and helpful. We had dinner in the restaurant and spent sometime in the bar. Menu fine, if unexciting, and food and drinks nicely presented. A pleasant experience.  The Spa Suite is a real bonus - large Jacuzzi, plus decent sauna room and a fully tiled hammam. I won't be doing middle of the night drives to the airport to get an early flight in future - I will be staying at this hotel. It is only 1.5 km as the crow flies from the centre of the airport ( 4km drive to terminal - simple well signposted) but there was no noise problem.

title: Stopover for a night
review: Got to the hotel around midnight. Quick and easy checkin, short and good information about facility. Nice room, sad view from the window....just concrete walls. Good bed, good bathroom. Smiling and greeting staff all over. Allright breakfast, very nice garden with a little bar. Perfect place if sleepover is needed due to the nearby Alicante Airport.

title: Handy for the airport
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your interest in our hotel and for your nice comments.  it's a great pleasure for us to know that you felt comfortable in our hotel.  We hope to see you soon around Alicante once again.  In the meantime, we remain  Kind regards!  DA

title: Airport friendly!!
review: From the reception area this looks like a lovely hotel. The only reason I didn't request another room however was I arrived late and was only staying one night. The room was  a good size and generally smart and comfy but smelt of stale cigarettes although it was supposed to be a non smoking room. I found several hairs in the room and there was some mould around the bath. The shower was positioned around 4 feet of the ground so thank goodness I am short. I requested a double room but was allocated two single beds.  The service at the bar was very slow. I did receive a free drink however at the end of the evening. The following morning my wakeup call was twenty minutes late. The shuttle service was however excellent and only 5 Euros!!   On the positive side the hotel was cheap and…

title: Great location for Alucante airport
review: Dear guest,  First of all, we wish to thank you for your interest in our hotel and for letting us know your experiencie with us.  We are really sorry if the room was not in the normal status it should be (fully clean, neutral smell, ...). I presume we couldn´t change your room as we were fully booked that day (due to local holidays in Elche).   With regards to the service in the bar, I guess it was also because the restaurant was fully booked on those days. We are sorry about that. We are trying to improve our agility and efficiency in the restaurant, and probably we didn't get it on that day. We beg your pardon.  We hope you can give us the chance to compensate your last stay with an unforgettable future stay. Do not hesitate to contact me at direccion@hotelareca.es to take personal care of your next stay.  Kindest regards  DA

title: Nice stopover hotel....for smokers
review: very near the airport if u are on a late flight etc only five mins get,s there modern clean and good sized rooms also has a spa but didnt get to use it as opens at 10.30 and was gone by then so would be good if they opened this facility a little earlier, used the gym and was fine and the staff were friendly, if needed would stay here again especially for the location!

title: Excellent hotel, convenient
review: Stayed there for business, the hotel is close to the airport and well located to get onto the highways for traveling to Murcia, Alicante and surrounds. Staff is friendly and helpful. The food in the hotel is EXCELLENT. Rooms are comfortable and well laid out. Some small corners could be cleaner but otherwise very good. Will stay again.

title: Be careful with your belongings.....there unfortunately a thief on staff
review: We are very happy that you found our hotel comfortable and suitable for your expectations.  We take note about your comments on the cleaning service.  We hope to see you soon around Elche.  Regards!!  D.A. Manager

title: Friendly reception staff; nice rooms; close to the airport
review: It's with a heavy heart and mixed feelings that I write this review. As an former owner of a travel agent in ireland, I have travelled all over the world and stayed in many hotels. The circumstances of our stay in the Areca Hotel unfortunately was not for pleasure, my family were staying while waiting for my mother to be repatriated back to ireland.  Although, the hotel was a lovely hotel and the front office staff very helpful, one staff member has completely ruined my opinion of the hotel.....I will explain why.  Myself and my brother entered an empty breakfast room for the last breakfast sitting, we were discussing the events of the week and I was quite upset. We left our table and walked out of the breakfast room, leaving the room empty except for two waiters. I realised…

title: Smart comfy hotel
review: First of all, we would like to inform and to calm down to those guests who are reading this, that we NEVER show our recorded images to any client, in order to preserve privacity and security of the rest of the guests. Only when Police claim us to show them recorded images, then we show them.  Therefore, most of the comments you write here are FALSE. We never showed you any image, so we understand that you imagined or invented all the information written down.  You think you lost a handbag (with 600 € in it), you think someone stole your handbag from the restaurant, and, in addition, you think that the handbag was stolen by one of our staff.  As I told you when you explained me the situation on Wednesday, first of all (what most of the people do, indeed) I told you to go to the police station and write a police report. That is the initial step, so that we can continue our investigation. We asked the 3 people that were working on that day, and no one (even the Restaurante Supervisor) saw any handbag during your breakfast time.  After that, I personally checked our recorded images, but our cameras are not in the restaurant area... There is only one camera in the cafeteria, but not int the restaurant. So, I couldn't see anything.  On Thursday, we talked again. I ask you about the police report, but you decided not to go to the police station, even when I explained how to go there (because the police don't come to the hotel for  those sort of situations), the way to fill out the claim, etc.  You told me that, probably in the afternoon, you would go there.  On Friday, again, I asked you about the police report. And again, for any mysterious and suspicious reason, you didn't go to the police station, which is the only thing I needed so that we continue with our investigation and talk to our insurance department.    Could someone tell us why a person who guarantee that someone in the staff stole a handbag with a lot of money, don't go to the police station and write a claim???  It's so dificult???   I explanied you many many times the procedure in order to clarify the situation, but it seems you didn't want to clarify it, according to your behaviour.   On the other hand, the feedback I had from you on Friday was a THREAT to publish a comment on Tripadvisor if we didn't refund the 600 € ….   Just one word:  BLACKMAIL   From my point of view, we did our best to help you and show you how to proceed with the investigation. You did nothing.  We invited you to some drinks in the cafeteria, not as a compensation of the SUPPOSED stolen handbag, but for trying to be  polite for the bad experience you were filling.  We are really sorry for your lost/stolen handbag. But it is very serious to accuse someone without evidences, and even more to announce it in public.    In conclusion, we take the opportunity to inform to our customers that we work hardly everyday to give the best service as possible, in the best secure environment we can.  But we need also the cooperation of our guests, if an incident (like this supposed robbery) occurs.

title: Still great!
review: Nice warm welcome on reception. Very good location near to the airport at Alicante so great for arrival late (like us) or an early departure. Nice courtyard where we had a lovely chilled glass of wine (very reasonably priced). Bar shuts quite early though (by Spanish standards!). Nice breakfast. Underground parking included.

title: Decent Hotel
review: This hotel is clean and close to Alicante Airport.  The breakfast buffet was very nice but I personally felt it was overpriced.  The rooms are very nice; being large, well equipped and clean although there was a very strong smell of cigarette smoke in the room and corridors.

title: Nice surprise near Alicante airport
review: Dear guests,  thank you very much for your comments and for your interest in our hotel.  With regards to the breakfast's comments, we think that, in our hotel, we offer to our clients several possibilities just to avoid that someone can find it overpriced. I mean, we offer a cafeteria service, in wich you can order just a coffee and a piece of bread with butter, for no more than 4 €... or take the option to have buffet breakfast with many different types of bread, cold meat, fruits, Nespresso coffee, etc. for 9 € per person (if you preorder) or 12 € per person if you don't reserve it in advance. In any case, sorry if we couldn't offered you the suitable option.   We hope to have the chance to welcome you soon.  In the meantime, we remain  Best regards!  D.A Manager

title: Food
review: Well, there are really nice surpirses. I needed a hotel near Alicante Airport en found this lovely hotel. I only had to pay €67 including breakfast. And I found a 4 star hotrl, 2 km away from the airport. It is clean, friendly and professional staff, nice rooms with all amenities, free wifi, and a spa. As a bonus nice restaurant/ cafetaria in cosy garden in open air.  For me this is a hotel to stay if you are here in the neighbourhood.

title: Airport hotel for Alicante
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your comments, and for your positive comments.  We are very happy to know that you enjoyed your stay and that our service reached your expectations.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you in a near future.  With best regards  DA Manager

title: ideal location close to airport and quit area
review: The hotel is lovely but the food in the bar is awful. I ordered chicken and the first serving was not cooked. The second serving was cooked but it was served with salt on it and the chips could hAve been counted on one hand. I realise that the hotel is one used for people using it as a stop over for a flight but that does not mean that we have to suffer substandard food.

title: Post/pre flight haven
review: Late flight, can't face the drive just yet ? Stopping here for an over night break could really transform the rest of your trip - really great hotel at prices that can't be beaten !   A recharge will become a standard on all future trips out here - such a brilliant find...

title: Ok but disappointed
review: Dear Nigel,  thank very much for your interest in our hotel and for your comments.  We hope to see you soon again!  Kind regards!!  D.A.  Manager

title: Worse food ever. Dont eat here!
review: There of us stayed in a lovely modern room but we were disappointed with some crucial elements which are advertised.   The massive issue for us was the lack of sound proofing in the rooms. We could not only hear corridor noise but downstairs and the tv next door! This is ok for a hotel that is two stars or lower but poor for a hotel claiming to be four stars and advertising sound proof rooms. Even more annoying as we specifically asked for a quiet room due to being light sleepers.   On the positive side I cannot bring myself to give the hotel a poor review as the staff and meal we had were lovely. If you're going to dinner make sure to come hungry! Really recommend the fish and the rice is a sight to be seen.   Overall good as a one night place to stay when flying out of…

title: Airport handy but food iffy
review: Dear Sara,  thank you very much for your comments.  We are sorry that we couldn't offer you the experience expected because of the noise. We should, perhaps, given you a room on a another part of the hotel. We are really sorry for that.  Please do not hesitate to contact me directly in case you are coming back again to the hotel. My email is:  direccion@hotelareca.es  In the meantime, we remain  With best regards  D.A. Manager

title: Shocking food, otherwise high standard!
review: Stranded in the hotel because the flight was cancelled. The hotel is fine. But do not eat at this hotel. Although the food was paid by the airline. I wouldnt recommend anyone to eat here. Said by a non picky eater.

title: Lovely room and a lovely hotel
review: What a breath of fresh air , I stayed here I had room 216 which was the smaller of 3 rooms that my brother and my nephew had , and it was lovely ... Modern up to date beautiful bathroom and nice big bed ,, the reception area is great the staff have been very nice and helpful the only reason I have not given this maximum is the location as its a drive into alicante and although close to the airport it is still 12 euros to get here and the town is not great , but I would stay here again as it has been the best hotel I have stayed in alicante  area

title: OK, But No Change
review: Dear guest,  We are happy to know that our hotel met your expectations.  We hope to see you again in a near future.  In the meantime, we remain  With best regards  D.A. General Manager

title: It is not Elche... its at the Airport
review: Having stayed here previously, we stayed again as we had an early morning flight, and this is about the closest to the airport. We arrived reasonably late, and there was nowhere open to eat, neither any drinks available, no coffee or tea making equipment in the rooms. Parking was OK in the underground garage. Again as in the previous time, the room was too warm, the receptionist agreed that it couldn't be lowered, as it was centrally controlled, the only alternative was to open the window, which meant it was quite noisy. As breakfast doesn't start until 07:00 we were given a care package, which quite frankly was uneatable. A vending machine for drinks, and nibbles would have been useful. I notice that the General managers response to a previous post, says that they now provide…

title: Loved it here
review: Dear guest,  First of all, we really appreciate your trust for coming back again to the hotel.  On the other hand, we are not happy that, again, we were not able to cover your expectations.  As far as the A/C is concerned, our hotel has only two different types of climate control: warm in winter and cold in summer. Unfortunately, it doesn´t have an individual climate control in the room. However, if you are coming again in a near future, I suggest you to send us an email in order to put the climate control exactly in the terms that suits you.  You can send it to:  reservas@hotelareca.es  With regards to the drinks, there is a minibar in the room with different soft drinks and water. In any case, if you don't find what you need, you can always order something to our 24 hours Reception staff.  It would be great if we can meet together on your next visit and talk a little bit about this issues.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you in your next visit.  In the meantime, we remain  With best regards  Daniel A. General Manager

title: Disappointing.
review: If you are looking for a hotel at the airport than this is it... no more than 5 minutes away. but if you are looking for something down town Elche then this is not it... I should have paid more attention.  That said the hotel is clean and well appointed albeit up a street in an industrial suberb close to the airport. make no bones about it, this is an airport hotel and it does exactly what it says on the tin.... if you need to stay overnight near Alicante airport, then I could not recommend this place highly enough, if you want stay in Elche then this is not what you want.  Service was friendly but not great - seemed understaffed. Stayed two mornings and the breakfast was lacking, particularly on the first morning as it was obvious the pastries were not fresh.

title: Very noisy room even with the window closed
review: Last night of our hols and we booked at the last minute, Room clean and well set out but I could not sleep because of the traffic noise. Breakfast for 7 euros per person was v. expensive and the coffee machine did oot work & only made cold coffee. El Plantio had much better breakfast so we would not stay again  The Receptionist did try very hard to tell us where to go

title: Close to Alicante airport but isolated
review: Dear guest,  We are really sorry that you could not rest properly. Although we think that our rooms are correctly insulated from the outter noise, it could happen that is not enough for some of our clients. In that case, I would suggest to take a room facing to the other part of the hotel, which is much more quite.  With regards to the breakfast, we are now working on the new breakfast with new products and a Nespresso coffee machine, which will be available on next January 2015. We are completely sure that our new breakfast will fulfill your expectations.  We hope you can give us another opportunity in a near future, so that you can test our new standard on that matter.  We hope to welcome you soon.  Best regards  Hotel Manager

title: Ideal for Alicante Airport
review: The hotel is very 5 min drive away from the Alicante terminal which is very convenient if you are travelling or working there. The hotel is situated in the town of Torrellano with bars and supermarkets nearby but not many attractive options for the demanding traveller. Alicante city is only 20 min away by taxi offering plenty of options for a great night out.  Rooms and deco are modern, however some of them start to feel a bit aged. Space and amenities are acceptable. Insulation is good and no noise from the outside was perceptible (a road connecting Alicante and Elche is a few metres away).  The bar and the restaurant offer a good selection of tapas and local dishes, including fish and meat.  The breakfast buffet is average and could be improved, specially the dried meats…

title: Good hotel for the airport
review: Dear guest,  thank you very much for your comments.   As the new General Manager of the hotel, I agree that the breakfast needs to be improved. That's why we are now working on that.   I am sure that, in your next visit, once we have our new breakfast ready, you can enjoy our new products available.  Should you have any other questions, do not hesitate to contact us.  In the meantime, we remain  With best regards  Hotel Manager

title: Good for stopover for Alicante airport
review: This hotel is situated within a10 minute drive of the airport. The staff are friendly and speak English. The rooms are clean and furnished simply but with everything that is required  for an overnight stay. There is a pleasant bar that has a selection of snacks, or needing something more substantial the restaurant has a very reasonable menu. We would stay here again if using Alicante Airport.

title: Convenient and efficient
review: Arriving at Alicante airport at night so stayed over before returning to airport next morning to pick up hire car.  Tried to contact hotel by e-mail but no reply so had to book via Late Rooms.  Taxi from airport costs €11 and takes 5 minutes.  Next morning took hotel shuttle back to airport costing €5 for for us both.  Double room with breakfast cost €73 but would pass on breakfast in future.  Very good value.  Reception staff very efficient and helpful.  Wifi fast and free.  Good Transit but hotel with little comfort.

title: Good airport hotel
review: Booked by company entertaining us on overseas trip for last night before flight home. Public areas and rooms of good standard, bit of a 'wobbly' shower tray floor, but not a problem. Restaurant nice, food OK. Handy shuttle bus to airport but needed air con. Recommended for airport stay.

title: Near airport ok for one night
review: Perfectly clean smart  modern hotel . Very good value.  Picked it because we a were arriving late almost midnight at Alicante airport . Taxi 12 euros from airport which was very steep because it's only about 1.5 km. I think we were ripped off. Reception man was ok. We asked about the swimming pool for the next day he said we could use it and the spa. Next morning told it was not open till 7.00 pm!  Which is a ridiculous state of affairs is it not? Breakfast woman very very unpleasant and unhelpful. Coffee machine needed filling you'd have thought we were asking her to climb Everest.   She was equally unpleasant to another very nice fellow from the Far East , we were  all bemused. Morning receptionist very nice and pleasant got us a taxi to La Zenia not ripped off 67 euros for…

title: Lovely hotel with very helpful staff, near airport
review: Very lovely hotel 5 mins away from airport by bus which you can get just outside the hotel.i travelled with my husband and kids kids (4&1 ) we booked the family room which turned out to be two joined rooms so there was lots of spaces wad it was very quite though th other room smelt of cigarette smoke it was not too bad after opening the windows  The rooms were maintained to a high level of cleanliness and there were showers which was ideal as I prefer not to use baths when travelling The staff were very helpful and went out of their way to be helpful.wifi was quick and free from anywhere in the hotel. There were lovely spa facilities I tried to use these in the mornings but was told they would open at 10 but when I retuned after 10 the steam room and sauna were still off so I…

title: Excellent hotel for a stopover. Near the airport.
review: If you fly early in the morning from Alicante or arrive late and do not wish to search for your hotel in Alicante or elsewhere, this hotel is excellent for such a stopover. Small rooms, but clean.Very helpful and friendly staff. Free parking and free wifi (although a bit slow). Breakfast early from 7 am (if you fly early that is a great help) and the price is very reasonable, even in high season. All-in-all a good little hotel, but probably not suitable to stay there for holidays, as there is not much to do and the beach too far away. Their restaurant out in the garden is very beautiful within the little waterfall and the lovely palm trees. Great atmosphere to eat and drink.

title: Over night stay
review: Thanks to Trip advisor found this great hotel after being forced to stay in Spain due to the strike in France. Could recommend it to anyone wishing to stay close to the airport. Small town and not much to do but for a base or overnight . Rooms excelent,staff helpful,food and drink  good. What more do you need.

title: Convenient hotel close to the airport
review: I stayed in the Areca hotel in view of its proximity to the airport,  The hotel itself is good. The rooms are comfortable and spacious. It is quiet. The restaurant seems ok but lack atmosphere. Ample free parking in front of the hotel. Free internet. The hotel is situated on the outskirts of Torrellano, a neighbourhood that still seems to be under construction.

title: boutique hotel in a tiny town
review: Firstly this town is in the  Elche area but in a small town called Torrellano- don't get confused by just looking at a Google map as  my partner did- read the directions.  Had planned to stay 3 nights for house viewing in the area but plans changed and so left after 2 nights and then re-booked for the last night before flight from Alicante the next morning. Reception were happy to accommodate my request to change pre booked nights so I  was impressed with them.   There is an underground  garage but it appeared locked although there is on street parking at the front and to the side  of the hotel.  Very nicely furnished with clean, modern lines  for  its rather odd location, although it is very handy for Alicante airport.  if you like privacy for your bathing please consider …

title: Perfect for alicante airport
review: We booked this hotel based on trip advisor as we had a midday flight from alicante back to uk after a short trip to visit friends in Valencia. Our flight was cancelled so instead we had the whole day here and the hotel allowed us a late check out (3pm) which was only 15 euros. The room was very clean, bright and spacious, including a cot for our 7 month old baby. The staff were very helpful and friendly. If you are looking for an overnight stay you won't go wrong with this hotel, although be warned the "spa" wasn't quite as good. The sauna and steam room were not working and the jacuzzi was very cold which was a shame as one of the reasons we did book originally was so we could take our baby into the pool.  Another negative was no tea or coffee or even cups which meant it was…

title: Great for the airport shame about the food
review: Stayed for one night prior to returning to UK. Staff spoke very good English and helped me with my poor Spanish. Couldn't do enough for you and all happy smiling faces. Shuttle bus to the airport every half hour and cost 5 Euros for 2 people, took 5 minutes. Room very clean, beds very comfortable, no door to the bathroom area, design of the room but not to every ones liking. Food not very good at all, had an evening meal, should have had Tapas in the bar. Breakfast OK but that coffee machine needs binning.

title: Would use again
review: Myself and my partner used this hotel for one night before we flew home the next morning. Beautiful reception and great service from receptionists. Very comfortable room and bed. The separate toilet and shower cubicles didn't bother us- We used the pool (the steam room and the sauna are only opened during the afternoon, we were told) both in the evening and morning. It was small but great- empty but for us!! One suggestion - - purchase a decent coffee/tea making machine in the restaurant area for breakfasts. We had to ask how to use it, and everyone who entered the restaurant after us, we watched scratching their heads also, before asking for help.

title: Good for the Airport but a coffee would be good!
review: We stayed here before an early flight the next day. Check in was efficient and easy. The room was basically all that you'd need, except no coffee/tea making equipment. The  Cafeteria opens at 7.00a.m. which is to late if you have an early flight, there are no drinks or snacks machines anywhere in the hotel, which was a surprise, again if you are arriving late in the evening. We were able to catch a quick drink, and a snack when we arrived, but only just as the bar closed early. The courtesy bus to Alicante Airport doesn't start until 09:00, but a taxis is only 11 euros. Would use this hotel again, as it is convenient, clean, and modern.

title: O.K., but lacking....
review: We booked this as an Airport Hotel, for Alicante/Elche Airport, and it is certainly very convenient for this. Check-in was friendly, and speedy, and the offer of car parking was made. (We didn't need this, as our car was collected, for long term parking). The room was clean,and the bathroom, though rather small, was fine. The modern, modular concept of no bathroom door, and a rather noisy, sliding glass door for the toilet, was, in my opinion not ideal, as it was impossible to avoid disturbing my husband, when I showered at 5.30, and then dried my hair! It is a case of both being woken up, but only one bathroom. A cup of coffee would have been a possibility, but, there are no tea/coffee making facilities in the rooms, and, impossible to comprehend for an "Airport Hotel", - no…

title: An Excellent Place For  A Stop Over
review: Arriving late at Alicante airport decided to stay here before travelling on the next day. Super modern and clean hotel, one of the best value ever and we have travelled a lot! Easy to get there by taxi (about 11 euros) even at midnight and then took the hotel shuttle (5 euros) the next morning to collect our hire car.   The staff were extremely pleasant and very helpful . We were wishing we had reason to stay longer.

title: Good Alicante Airport Hotel
review: If it is neccessary to saty over for a flight in or out of Alicante airport then the Hotel Areca is very convenient, very clean an d very reasonably priced. The rooms are good size with serarate toilet and bathroom facilities. The location is minutes from the airport by car/taxi/bus but not walkable. There is a restaurant, coffee lounge and Spa - so really everything you need for a convenient overnight stay when using the airport.

title: Great Location For Travelling to Alicante Airport
review: The Hotel is very conveniently located and clean.The staff very courteous and helpful.The room was spacious and clean. Pleasant garden setting, with friendly cafeteria staff.For vegetarian they were able to cater, a good dinner. My room was faced towards the road but the noise level was low. Around the walking distance of the Hotel you would find a few restaurants which offer various different cuisines. The area amount the hotel is more rundown

title: Our last night in Spain
review: My husband and I stayed in this hotel our last night in SpIn because of convenience for airport. We were met by a friendly receptionist. We had dinner in the restaurant where the waiter was very friendly and helpful. Dinner was excellent, I had the Lubina and my husband had the BolognAise. Wine excellent as usual from Alicante.  Room was very modern and comfortable. Free wifi offered too. My husband and I visited this hotel a couple of years ago and must admit standards haven't changed. We enjoyed it then too.  We didn't have time to use the Spa but maybe next time.

title: Modern, Stylish and Comfortable
review: Ideally suited for a pre flight stay.  The hotel has a sleek look.  The staff were friendly and helpful.    The bed was very comfortable but the minimalist style came before practicality of use.   The bathroom was open to the room - good for romantic couples but others could find this embarassing.   The loo did have a sliding door which had obscured glass and was very heavy to move.   Nowhere to put makeup etc by the room mirror, if someone was using the bathroom. Pleasant outdoor area for drinks.   No in room coffee facilities.  Overall, it had almost everything for an overnight stay.

title: let down by the spa
review: This is a very clean and well run Hotel with great friendly receptionist and comfy beds. High powered showers in the room with good tv listings. We booked this for the steam room and a massage. 48 hours before we went we tried to book a massage but they could get anyone after 1pm and when we went to the spa the steam room was broken. So if you want a massage they need plenty of notice! This is a great Hotel for the airport as its 5 minutes but despite the receptionist saying its 5 minutes and will be no more than 10euros it was 15 euros in the end. So try and book your taxi without the help of the hotel as a normal taxi is 8 euros we found out.

title: Not Only for the Airport
review: We have stayed at this hotel in the past as we were spending a few days in the area, and returned as it was convenient for our sporting event at Gran Alicant.  The hotel facilities are excellent, the only disappointment was that the pool and spa don't open until 7pm, far too late in our estimation.  We enjoyed chilling out with a drink in the garden before wandering into town to dine at one of the many bars and restaurants.  The reception staff were very friendly and helpful.  Wifi was available in our room.  Be careful in the shower, the floor can be very slippy and there is no grab rail.  An excellent place to stay, not just for the airport.

title: Quality hotel close to Alicante Airport
review: Warm welcoming in this quality hotel with amazing garden. You can eat in the garden.  Food is fresh, well prepared,  for reasonable price.  And menu is in English.  Room is big,  clean, with moderneequipment.  On top you have free access to the spa (haven't tried)

title: Best hotel for airport.
review: Stayed here for a night before an early morning flight from alienate, we booked the park and fly package which was really good value. We made use of the free spa and got the bus from right outside into Alicante for the day. The room was lovely, outside bar and restaurant very good and the staff most helpful I've ever come across in spain. We will stay here every time in future for Alicante flights.

title: Perfect hotel close to Alicante Airport!
review: Love it for the price of 40EUR for one night!! The hotel is not in walk distance from The Airport but very close in a taxi, around 10EUR. The hotel has an Airport shuttle for 5EUR charged per room at the hotel. Would defenetly come back to this hotel.

title: Great Hotel... but dinner was a big disappointment
review: The Hotel was excellent.  Good sized rooms with comfortable beds, a great place to stay (our Villa wasn't available until the day after we arrived in Alicante, so we looked for a Hotel close to the airport).  We'd booked a family room for the two of us and our two boys (ages 16 and 13), but they gave us two rooms adjacent to one another - first class service and a very helpful reception.  We arrived at around 22.00 hrs and decided to eat at the in-house Restaurant 'Carabi'.  We were seated on the outdoor terrace in great-looking surroundings.   The starters were plain and the main courses disappointing even though it was relatively expensive (not over-priced, just dear in comparison to the cost of the rooms). My eldest and I had pasta dishes which were served to us cold - they…

title: The place to stay if flying to or from Alicante Airport
review: Not very inspiring when we viewed the hotel from the outside but do not be put off.  The hotel inside is ritzy.  We asked for a room at the back to avoid any road noise at the front.  Our room faced the airport and Torrellano Train Station and despite this it was surpisingly quiet.  Our room was spacious very clean and very smart.  If you like a good breakfast book it, it was excellent.  The usual continental plus a full English from the buffet, lots of fresh fruit and juices, coffee good.  We stayed 2 nights prior to our departure from the airport in order to go to the beautiful city of Alicante by train.  Just a 5 minute walk down the road and you are at the station where trains depart hourly.  Two stops and 15 minutes later you are in the city centre.  Do not miss out on a…

title: Great hotel for short stay
review: This is a perfect hotel and perfect location for a night before our flight. Very clean and comfortable rooms, nice friendly staff and lovely garden setting if you want an evening snack or meal.  Close to train stop also if you want to visit the great city of Alicante if you have time.  Would definitely recommend to others.

title: Great hotel as airport stop-over
review: We stayed at The Areca when we arrived at Alicante for our holiday to the Costa Blanca, and also on our return to the airport a week later. The taxi from the airport is around 12 euros and are obviously readily available at the airport but also the receptionist will call one for you from the hotel. At first glance, the building doesnt look brilliant from outside, but in fact it is surprisingly modern, clean and spacious inside. Breakfast was typical buffet with helpful staff. Bar stays open til late and was light and airy. There is also a seating area outside the rear of the building which is nice. The rooms were modern and clean. If you are staying with someone that you worry about seeing you in the shower, or hearing you in the toilet, then maybe its not for you, as it is very…

title: Good Hotel Near Airport
review: We were taken to this hotel as our flight was cancelled. It had been a very long day of waiting around in the very hot airport. On getting to the hotel we were quickly given our room key by very helpful reception staff who spoke perfect English. Our room was very clean and modern, Not keen though on having no door to the bathroom or the glass door on wc. This meant one had to sit on the bed while the other had use of the bathroom. Ok for couples but friends may find its lack of privacy not to there taste. Staff were very helpful at breakfast and went that bit extra to provide gluten free bread for my friend. Plenty of choice for all.

title: No coffee?????
review: Why have a nice Hotel, with garden, close to airport, and yet not have either coffee making facilities in each room, or coffee available for us poor travellers who have an early morning flight>?????? I asked receptionist evening before, for 4.30am coffee....and she noted it, but made no promises..... No coffee appeared, and I commented on it on checking out....Was mer with "You must have misunderstood her" and other remarks about my lack of comprehension!! he offered to see what he could so then, but too late as we had to be off.......... So although place was fine, and area was fine, I won`t be returning!!!

title: A clean modern well presented hotel with good service and a great breakfast buffet really convenient to alicante airport
review: We stayed here after taking a late flight to alicante. Literally 5 minutes by taxi from the airport the late night reception service was excellent. Room good, bathroom state of the art, breakfast amazing. I find it hard to fault this place and would definitely use it again.

title: Airport Bus Service
review: The main reason we picked this hotel was its proximity to Alicante airport, and the added bonus of a free shuttle service to the airport early the next day. Staff were very friendly and the food was very good, I didn't have the breakfast as I left very early but my wife enjoyed it and said the choice was very good. The shuttle to the airport literally takes 5 minutes and was very right on time. Simply told the lovely receptionist what time I was looking to leave and she sorted out the driver. Great attitude shown by all the staff, very clean and pleasant rooms, would stay here again for sure. Enjoyed it.

title: Lovely room cold breakfast
review: I enjoyed staying at this hotel near the airport. It only took five minutes in a hire car and free underground parking as well. The room was modern and comfortable. Frosted glass doors on the bathroom were fine for me. The breakfast looked appetising but the bacon was cold and sausages luke warm. Cereal, fruit juice and breads were fine.

title: A nice end to the holiday!
review: A nice , clean modern hotel with friendly staff and plenty of parking.  We stayed here the night before our flight home to the UK and enjoyed a last evening of warm sunshine before heading back to grey skies!  The bathrooms are very typical of modern Spanish hotels - lovely kit but you need to be VERY good friends (to say the least!) if you're sharing a room.  We enjoyed it and wouldn't hesitate to recommend it as a good quality hotel at a very respectable rate.

title: nice, but...
review: The hotel was nice, modern and clean. Good terrace, good restaurant, good spa. Very convenient for airport. Friendly staff. BUT.... the fact that the bathrooms have no doors, is unacceptable. Furthermore, the toilet door is a thin glass one, which didnt slide smoothly or silently. At least there could have been a door in the small hall to isolate the bedroom.....but even that doesnt exist.  When we asked for another room, were told all are similar and that it was the style of the architect... I would prefer that the architect confines his excentric taste to his own home...

title: Happy to have been there!
review: Staying for two nights, we are happy about having chosen Areca Hotel. Main reason for our choice was the short distance to Alicante airport av well as Torrellanos Railway Station and bus stop (for small local trips during our 2-day stay). Considered the low prices charged for the rooms, we were impressed of the common areas at the hotel, and also about the guest room itself. Very clean, good beds, cool drinks available, ok wi-fi. Spacious closets. Free mini-safe. Nice being able to open the window. Very good soundproofing, all quiet when the window was closed. We would however appreciated hot water and coffe/tea at our room. About staff: Fully serviceminded and helpful, the more laudable as we were reasonable low budget travellers. We would be happy to stay here again.

title: Nice hotel in a small town
review: This hotel is situated in a very small town on the outskirts of Alicante airport, there's a bus which takes just over 5 minutes to reach the airport.  The hotel itself is really nice, the rooms are clean and tidy with good sized beds. Generally the wifi was fairly good with a stable connection.  1 big issue with this hotel was if you are sharing and don't really know the person then this will be an issue, as the shower has no door and the toilet only has a fairly see through glass door.  The breakfast was really good and well worth it, the assistant who was working most mornings was incredibly friendly at 7am and was really helpful - she was fab!

title: A well-rested break before returning to the UK
review: Areca Hotel is a spitting distance from the airport and therefore it took all the stress out of getting to the airport on time, which meant mucho relaxation in the beautiful gardens and having enjoyable evening meals on the terraza! Could not want for more and in such pleasant surroundings, with pleasant staff

title: Really nice hotel close to Alicante airport.
review: Really nice hotel close to Alicante airport. Literally round the corner from the airport, in the nice Spanish town of Torrellano, restaurant is good, but also good choice of bars and restaurants in easy walking distance. Nice rooms, clean and coo. Good value, good place to stay on your way out or back.

title: great!
review: Clean, modern, not too expensive, convenient, lovely garden, very convenient for Alicante airport. Only thing that I'd have liked was if the spa was open longer - 3 hours in the evening isn't really that much - so I didnt get to use it which was the main reason I booked, but everything else was really really great. Hope you can open the spa for longer in future...

title: Excellent stopover hotel
review: Brilliant location and truly excellent value.  Arrived around 3am to fluent English speaking night-time receptionist.  Comfy bed, clean room and generally really nice hotel.  Would not hesitate to come back.

title: Excellent hotel close to airport
review: Great hotel in good location and only €10 taxi to Alicante airport. The room was nice, modern, spotless and had free WIFI. There was no tea / coffee making facilities in the room which I was surprised with. The staff spoke excellent English and were very helpful. This is a hotel I would recommend.

title: Good hotel, close to airport
review: A great hotel in a good location in relation to Alicante airport. Nice rooms, a bit small. Separate toilet and bathroom, modern and clean. Safe parking inside the hotel areas.  We ate at the hotel restaurant, good food but quite expensive. The breakfast was somewhat disappointing, small selection. There was no coffee / tea making facilities in the room, this was negative. The staff spoke English well  In all, a hotel I can recommend.

title: Good price/quality ratio
review: + : The room was very good, clean, with free good quality wireless Internet connection. The hotel is located very close to Alicante Airport.   - : Only the room service menu had poor choice, and unfortunately breakfast was not open yet at 6,30, so I had to leave the hotel still hungry.

title: Surprisingly close to being a proper 4 star for the location
review: It's not a holiday hotel, but for a stopover for a night or 2 while you're in the area, the Areca is very pleasant. Certainly on a par with AC or NH Hotels. Breakfast was poor and I didn't try the Spa. But the quality of the room and standard of service were very good, and they have a pleasant courtyard in which to relax.

title: Short holidaytrip
review: The employees of your hotel were very friendly and helpfull. After a busy day we enjoiyed  sitting in your garden and have dinner there. However the hotel is sittuated near the airport and close to a busy road we slept  well. We had a very pleasant stay and hope   to come back one day.

title: Would have been a great stay if the facilities were open as advertised
review: We arrived and were happy was only 10 euro cab from the airport.  Rooms were nice only spanish tv but room service menu was a nice bonus.  I was told on arrival the spa was closed until 8.30pm then would open later so we decided to have dinner first so could visit the spa later. We were unable to use the outside terrace due to a private party which was a shame as it looked lovely on the website. We ate and had a few drinks which were very cheap which was a nice surprise - food was pretty basic but ok. Went down to reception at 9 to use the spa and were told it still wasnt open due to a private party using it that had over run (the same ones using the terrace earlier) so we couldn't use the spa today. I said that was unfair as we ate early so could use the spa and had booked the…

title: Easy to find - near airport
review: The hotel is close to the airport and is easy to find. It is ideal for travellers wishing to overnight near the airport. Clean and comfortable throughout with pleasant staff. Free parking on the street right outside the hotel.

title: Helpful staff, practical room, near airport
review: Hotel Areca is a great hotel for business or travelers. The airport and car rentals are very close. The staff was very helpful and professional. Room small but clean and practical. Parking on the side of the street is free. Economical.

title: A very confortable hotel near the airport
review: We stayed here for one night during our holidays in Southern Spain It's a good place to stay, just 10 m' drive from the airport of Alicante and it is really easy to find.We paid a convenient price for the standard of the hotel, the rooms are big and clean. We slept very well because the place is quite and we didn't hear noise from the road of from other rooms. The breakfast is complete and tasty. I will recommend it

title: Spa facilities made it worthwhile
review: Couldn't fault the service, the staff, the facilities, everything was great for the price. Thanks!

title: Very good airport hotel
review: We stayed one night at this hotel, en route to the mountains from Alicante.  It was a very modern and comfortable hotel, and quite close to the airport.  On Friday night, we had to take a taxi to the hotel, but the shuttle was running on Saturday morning.  Our room was clean and spacious, and the hotel was quiet at night.  Breakfast was quite good, as there was a wide range of food available, and the dining room was really pleasantly fitted.  Overall, this hotel is very good value.

title: Great place to stay
review: Great place to stay if you need to be located close to the airport. The staff were excellent, friendly and always wanted to help. Free wi-fi in rooms. Room was clean, modern and spacious. Minibar in room with free Fanta and water.  Hotel-airport shuttle bus only runs 5am to 6pm (and slightly diffent times on a weekend I think). Taxi to/from the airport costs €10 and is 5minute drive. The spa only opens from 7pm until 10pm.  Avoid the restaurant. Poor basic food at very expensive prices.

title: Excellent stopover
review: We stayed at this hotel as we had a late flight into Alicante. Its perfect for a stopover and should be consider for a few days as its close to motorway and therefore all the mountains behind the Costa Blanca.  Our room was larger than average hotel room, modern and attractively designed. The garden is a good place to relax with a drink after a long flight.  The staff were very friendly.

title: Quality hotel close to Alicante Airport
review: On a four day visit to the area 27th Sept '11 we arrived on a cheap Ryanair flight from Bournemouth at 11.00pm.We had a taxi to this hotel (15 euros) and reservations for two double rooms, with the intention of setting off early next morning. The staff were welcoming and efficient and we were soon in our rooms- both an excellent standard, clean, spacious and modern with huge comfortable beds. The bathroom was really superb and there was a separate loo. So it's a great place to overnight close to the airport, but the local town is featureless which is fine if you're just passing through. Big bonus is we wanted to nip back to the airport to hire a car (so we could drop it back at the airport on departure) and the hotel has a free mini bus shuttle to the airport (not from though).…

title: Perfectly located near airport.
review: Very nice hotel located near airport with trans to airport. Found everything neat and clean.  Room a bit small for two travellers needing two beds.  Cafe food and service great.  Front desk young lady spoke good English.

title: I would use this hotel again
review: We landed late, needed to pick up supplies in Alicante next morning so decided to organise a stopover.  I'd maxed out my cards, and had to pay in cash on my arrival, but it wasn't a problem - reception was very nice about it. Having read other reviews, and based the decision to stay upon them, I must say that the complaint I read about the corridor lighting being low may be factually accurate, but it's not a problem, and in my opinion I thought it was restful. The underground garage was adequate for me to park my old merc e220, which is more like a small bus than a car, parking was included in our deal, um the lighting does go off a bit sharpish, but you aren't left in total darkness and the switch is easy to find, it's got a little green light on it. Breakfast was fine, they…

title: nice adequate hotel
review: used this hotel for airport use and its very close to alicante airport which was ideal for us.  Nice clean modern and toiletries provided.  Rooms not sound proof, next rooms tv was loud and lots of commotion of which we heard every movement.  Would deffo recommend though for airport location alone.

title: Slip-sliding away
review: Good location for Alicante airport and for hire car return, particularly now the new terminal is open. Parking is under the hotel and in a secure garage from which there are lifts to Reception and to all floors. Very helpful. Pleasant and obliging staff. Receptionists speak good English. WiFi limited to hotel lobby. Our snack supper was fine and quickly provided; breakfast buffet also good. Funny smell in the room (drains) and, as other reviewers have stated, no door to the shower room. Toilet does have a (glass) door but no lock. Bed firm (we liked) but there was no aircon in May and the Hotel is near enough to the airport for visitors not to want to open the window and let in the noise. The shower tray is slick and no non-slip bath mat is provided. Anyone with a mobility…

title: Poor restaurant
review: Dissapointed as I expected more from previous reviews.  The room was fine, but the double bed comprised two single beds!  The corridors were not well insulated for sound and sound also came through the closed window from the outer courtyard quite easily.  No wifi in hotel. The shower hot and cold temp drifted in and out next morning.  The biggest let down though was the restaurant. The hotel is actually in the small village of Torrellano not Elche so there’s no where decent to go except the hotel.  With this in mind I don’t think the restaurant has to try very hard.  The restaurant took ages to be cleared for the evening meal after a christening had taken place.  Only one waitress was serving so service was really slow.  My meat was very tough and the ‘veg’ comprised a single…

title: Excellent Hotel and very friendly staff
review: A modern hotel with lovely rooms and very friendly staff. Town only ten mins from airport by taxi. Very few holidaymakers around so be prepared to converse in Spanish with the very friendly locals. Perfect for a quiet getaway.

title: Very nice hotel
review: We stayed at Hotel Areca since we needed to catch an early flight from Alicante. The hotel is situated a few minutes drive from the airport. The taxi to the airport cost 10 euros.  The rooms are very nice and clean. There is no door to close when you take a showe though :-) The spa area is nice as well and there is also a restaurant in the hotel serving the best paella I've ever eaten. Highly recommended!

title: Excellent, modern hotel, friendly staff, great rate!
review: Very close to the airport, max 10 mins from Alicante airport and 15 minutes into town of Alicante.  Very friendly staff, modern, spacious and clean rooms.  Would highly recommend.

title: Modern style, convenient to airport
review: Beautiful, modern style rooms. Very convenient to the airport - we just stayed one night before we flew out and it was a five minute ride to the aiport. Staff was friendly and helpful, with good English skills. Loved the style of the rooms - but people should be aware that the bathrooms had no door to the shower/sink area. The toilet had a glass door that was see through. With our four year old it was fine, other families or travelling companions may have problems with the limited privacy.
